Recenzija: I think the bar at ROVI provided a bit of privacy and acoustic kindness. I'd probably sit there again.
Staff were great. Helpful without being overbearing. Food was delicious and surprising, living up to expectations All four of us were delighted by the experience of eating here

Ive always appreciated this restaurant for its warmth and knowledgeable staff. Lately, though, the experience has become more transactionalfocusing on upselling rather than guiding with care. The wine pairings feel less thoughtful, and the ambiance has grown robotic rather than inviting. Its disappointing to see what it has become, and we wont be back. I hope they rediscover the hospitality that once made it special.

Fabulous tasty and different food. The service is fantastic, you can try a sample of wines before buying a bottle and the team were very patient with us when we stayed much longer at our table than most. Highly recommended.

I really wanted to love Rovi and went on our anniversary! Im a fan of Ottos recipes and chose the restaurant myself as I love vegetarian food. BUTas one who has a coriander allergy it was impossible to eat at the restaurant. The waitress took the menu from me, and after speaking with the chef, she came back with the menu with everything crossed out except one meat dish (I dont eat meat!) , burrata and hummus with pita. Rather than leaving as it was a weekend (and our anniversary), we stayed. I was disheartened and surprised that the chef couldnt prepare one fish or chicken dish without a sauce/marinade as a solution. Seems to me at such a high end restaurant a chef should be able to accommodate allergies with some sort of creative solution. After looking so forward to this meal, I was beyond disappointed.
Fabulous food and so very creative. A bit on the high side in terms of price. Drinks were delicious and service was good..

Great experience! Discovering Ottolenghis cuisine was a revelation, an extraordinary and natural taste, a meticulous attention and respectful of flavors and textures, this is how dishes are born composed of simple ingredients but treated with extreme care and with great intelligence. Absolutely worth trying!
As always the food was different and absolutely delicious. Excellent service too. It is a real pleasure to have a meal at Rovi. Thank you very much.

The food is overpriced. The service changed several times during the evening. Waiters were overwhelmed. We waited over an hour for dinner. Just a little apology after we made the complaint. We expected more from one of Yotam Ottolenghi. Quality has declined since the last visit in winter 2024. Too bad
Everything is right, interior, staff, food provided a lunch to rememberb Atmospheric, friendly and great tastes.   Ottolenghi et al.'s cuisine is the best!

We had a lovely evening at Rovi. The wait staff, the food and ambience was fantastic. We enjoyed sitting at the bar and saw the action and engaged with the staff. We selected the Chefs menu which gave us an array of amazing dishes. The crispy aubergine tops, pesto pasta was flavorful, grilled shrimp and their signature dish, celeriac shawarma were delicious. Every dish came with a unique and flavorful taste.

We were invited by friends to lunch to celebrate my husbands birthday. What great friends we have! delicious food, excellent service by exceptional people and lovely ambiance. Ive always been a huge fan of Ottolenghi, the restaurants and cafes never disappoint.

Wow wow wow!!!! An unbelievable experience! If you visit London this is a must!!! Yotam Ottolenghi has left Rovi in the more than capable hands of head chef Andy Frantzeskos and boy what a food journey this was!! Andy is sooooo passionate about the food he is serving ! My taste buds were pinging all over the place! Normally meat is top of my list but Andys vegetarian and fish dishes were exquisite! I can hand on heart say this was my favourite lunch ever!!!!! it did help that I had my best friend with me my son Joe! hats off to you Andy! What a chef what a host. We will be back!!!!

We dined as a couple in what we understand to be not long reopened Rovi further to a refurb & were very impressed with the atmosphere, decor, the very tasty dishes we chose and all the staff, who couldn't have been more welcoming and helpful - nothing was too much trouble, even accommodating us when we turned up earlier than planned. Alex & Jacob, in particular, were great from start to finish, with Alex guiding us through the menu and sharing his recommendations & helping us pick the right number of dishes, as we wanted to try them all! The dishes were a taste sensation and definitely celebrate vegetables from root to tip. If all vegetables tasted like this, I don't think I would miss eating meat. Particular favourites were the crispy aubergine tops, celeriac shawarma & the burrata.

Loved the vibe of this restaurant. We booked it as we were looking for an exclusively gluten-free meal and they were very accomodating. Everything we had was absolutely delicious. Would definitely recommend.

This sophisticated and sociable slice of Central London is a shoppers paradise, offering the latest fashions, gadgets, and souvenirs. Fitzrovia is conveniently located between the major retail thoroughfares of Regent Street to the west and Tottenham Court Road to the east, with a handful of well connected Tube stations dotted around the area for easy transport. This neighborhood is a favorite among foodies as well, with an impressive number of quality restaurants, pubs, cafes and food shops vying for your patronage  especially along Charlotte Street and near Goodge Street Station.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Fantastic place. We went there for a beer so we didn't eat anything. The bartender, Anselmo, stra helpful: he made us try the different beers of the house before making us order then recommended places not to be missed in the city. What about: the right man at the right time!   If you have just arrived in London, want a beer and need to settle in a little, this is the place for you!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the fantastic review and feedback. Our bartender Anselmo will be pleased to hear of such complements.  We hope to welcome you when back in the city. Ciao

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Superb, we were served by Anselmo, at the top. The bar is superb good atmosphere, very friendly and lively

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and feedback. We hope to welcome you back soon in the future. Merci!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Eaten two salads and a simple burger, exaggerated cost even if you are in London.....89 pounds a steal. Good food but overpriced and location in the basement.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi Laura,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Were pleased to hear that you enjoyed the food, though were sorry to learn that you felt the prices did not meet your expectations.  As a centrally located venue in London and part of an international brand, our pricing reflects our location, operating costs, and the overall experience we aim to offer, all of which are clearly displayed on our menu before ordering. While we understand that value is subjective, we strive to deliver quality ingredients, generous portions, and a unique atmosphere alongside our food.  We appreciate your comments and will be sure to share them with the team. Thank you again for visiting and for sharing your perspective.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Great food, slight issue with one dish but the service was absolutely fantastic and more than resolved the issue and went above and beyond.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi Vicky,  Thank you for the review, and glad to hear we turned things around. Hope to welcome you back soon!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: The location is gorgeous, the menu is Hard Rock Cafe style and the service is smooth and quick (multilanguage Abselmo is a pro!)

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for taking the time to review, and your amazing feedback. Will pass on the complements to Anselmo.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: I love this branch of the Hard Rock Cafe. I love eating here and we always have a good time when we are here. Today we went to the shop. The shop is so cool, it is the biggest Rock Shop in Europe. The clothes are so cool and have great designs. There is a wide variety of things to buy here. The decor of the shop area is so cool. Whats really brilliant is that there is a facility available to book an Uber, Theatre Tickets and London Attractions. The shop is worth checking out. Hard Rock Cafe Piccadilly is close to Piccadilly Circus station.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the lovely review and cool feedback. Glad to hear that the kiosk to book an Uber and various attraction in London area made it simple and easy to navigate.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Beautiful lay out  friendly staff  food was incredible  10/10 Highly recommended  very busy but service was excellent

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and feedback. We hope to welcome you back soon for another memorable experience at our location

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: I happened to this Hard Rock by chance and I was served Marco and Anselmo, they were kind and professional right away, and very nice! I had a good afternoon for my birthday here! Thank you, I'll be back soon!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  What a wonderful review! I am so pleased to hear that you had a great time with us. This is just what we want to hear. I will be delighted to pass on your feedback and share your great experience with Anselmo and Marco. It will be great to see you again and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Great location right in the centre of London. Excellent environment and good food. An animated and fast team. Decoration on the walls with the Beatles and other artists. Do not forget to make the reservation on time online. We love that unforgettable night. Thank you

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and feedback. We hope to welcome you back on your near future visit to London.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: My girlfriend and I sat at the bar at Hard Rock and had an amazing time. The service was excellentfriendly, attentive, and fast, and the atmosphere made our night even better.  A special thank you to Anselmno and Shah for taking such great care of us and making the whole experience truly enjoyable. Well definitely be back.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for taking the time to review and the lovely feedback of our bar team. We will surely pass on the complements and we hope to welcome you back soon for another great experience.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Anselm Great experience here in London at 'Hard Rock Cafe here in Piccadilly. Courteous staff, great environment, we spent a good time, to be repeated  highly recommend to everyone, TOP staff !!!!!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and amazing feedback of our top staff. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: This Hard Rock is practically close to the tube station, in the heart of London's nightlife. The upper floor is used as a merchandising while the lower floor is the restaurant. Very good food quality and impeccable service and extremely available. In my case, after spilling a glass of coke, still not even tasted, they immediately cleaned everything up and even offered the new coke. Clean and well organized. Highly recommended

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for taking the time to review and the amazing feedback to both our Retail Shop and Restaurant. We hope to welcome you back in the future  Ciao!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Terrible experience we ordered a few starters to share and a cocktail, only to be told once food arrived we couldn't order any more cocktails due to it not being a main meal. Due licensing! Should have been mentioned at the start, complete waste of money! Such a shame too as all other hard rocks have been fab! Wouldn't return as we had high hopes

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and feedback. I do understand your frustration but as our liquor license from Westminster Council specifically dictates that there is a substantial meal associated with an alcoholic beverage hence the team has mentioned it to your table and offered to be moved into the bar area where licensing restriction doesn't require such. We do ask our guest if they are for dining or just drink and a snack which you will be directed to the bar area if available at that time.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: it was a beautiful evening, our server Anselmo was exceptional and very kind, there was a great atmosphere. totally recommend!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi Monica,  Thank you for the review and feedback. Will definitely pass on the complements to our server Anselmo for the great experience at our Piccadilly location. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: We had two great smash burgers, the service was quick and helpful. Anselmo was not only a great waiter, but offered us some great suggestions on some nice places to visit during our stay here in London! Highly recommended place also for those with food intolerances, you will be advised by the well-informed staff.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Hi there,  Thank you for the review and feedback. Glad to hear that you had an amazing time at our location and hope to welcome you back soon in the future.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: Perennially fashionable since the days of Henry VIII, the aristocratic Clubland of St James's is a premier destination for high end craft and bespoke design. Here youll lose count of the Royal Warrants (which indicate that the Royal Family patronizes the establishment) seen in shop front windows, even during a short stroll to bordering Green Park or St Jamess Park. With the brightly lit and constantly buzzing junction of Piccadilly Circus at its northeast corner and none of Central London too far away, this is an surprisingly central and accessible part of town, especially given its prosperous demeanor.

Restoran: Hard Rock Cafe London Piccadilly Circus
Recenzija: This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.

A very nice place, with traditional Lebanese cuisine. Naan bred and black falafel are delicious; had never tried hummus tatbila before, and I found it absolutely tasty . You sit close together around one long shared table

We had an amazing experience at The Barbary! Sitting at the bar was perfect, you could watch the chefs at work and see their attention to detail and skill up close. The food was flavorful, creative, and beautifully presented. Definitely a spot Id recommend to anyone who loves good food and a lively atmosphere.

Excellent restaurant! If you can get a reservation, do it. We came for lunch and had a wonderful experience. Probably the best food we ate during our trip to London. Its a small 24 seat counter restaurant. The staff walks you through the menu and gives advice . Everything is meant to be shared. Most dishes are cooked on an open fire grill in the center of counter for all to see. The vibe is cool and the food is delicious. I Highly recommend.

Off the Chart! The Barbary did not disappoint. Food, service and ambience all amazing. Intimate, fun, great staff. A perfect date venue. And the food? Wow. The spinach, feta and yoghurt dip with nan is a must. The lamb is mouth watering. Octopus and pumpkin seeds? Can I have some more please. Nothing disappointed. Everything excelled. We were left scratching our heads if we had actually ever had a better meal anywhere (and that includes London, Paris, NY and we like to dine). The Barbary is a must. Thanks team. You are talented, welcoming and have created something very very special. We will be back very soon.

We came here to celebrate our 40th anniversary ( our son recommended the restaurant). Everyone sits at the bar which is kind of a horseshoe shape with the kitchen in the middle. Seating is a bit tight- we were greeted enthusiastically and began the process of ordering eating etc. the food was very delicious and the atmosphere was very fun. Book a table- highly recommended.

This is my personal beat meal I have had for 2025, where do I start, the atmosphere is amazing, then the service followed by the food   Jane was truly so fabulous with helping us choose this amazing food  Been to many London Restaurants and for me is the best

What a fantastic find! We stumbled upon The Barbary while exploring the area and thought it looked interesting, so booked for lunch a few days later. An awesome experience! The restaurant is small, and tight! But.. that almost added to the experience! We were sat at the counter and watched the amazing team create their magic. Service was perfect, professional, enthusiastic and could not be faulted. The menu consists of a typical sharing concept. We stared with incredible naan cooked as we watched. Humous and labneh were so fresh and bright. Their signature cigar starter was hot, fresh and so flavorful with a yogurt/mint sauce. We then had the salmon and lamb, both were outstanding the salmon was pink and perfect, as was the lamb! Again incredible flavors and presentation. We added the chili cauliflower and that also was a nice combo, adding another texture to the meal. Bottle of Tempranillo, house wine but certainly decent, and we live in Spain! All in all a fantastic lunch, we cant wait to return on our next London visit.

The food was outstanding - imaginative, well prepared and well presented, if frankly expensive. The staff behind the counter were equally welcoming, attentive and interested in providing excellence in dining.  The maitre d however made it clear that the sole purpose of the restaurant was to extract as much money as possible in as short a period of time as possible.  We were 10 minutes over our allotted 1:30 booking, with three free seats at the bar, when we were told that either we preferred something else or we should leave - this after having requested the bill from another team member.  I get it, they need to make money. It just wont be from me in future.  Thanks, but I wont be tricking you again.

How wonderful, everything perfect, the concept, the place. The food and the music. A mix of flavors and cultures in the dishes and in the team on this side and beyond the counter around which you eat. A group of young and very talented boys who put their different origins in the inspiration and flavors of dishes with Israeli, Arab, Lebanese influences and so on. Every dish with a tapas concept to share is a journey and a discovery. You guys deserve the success you're getting and all the best. Thank you for the wonderful experience it will be an honor and a pleasure to return to visit you

Wonderful experience! Friendly and professional staff. Blackened salmon was perfectly prepared, coffee rubbed chicken was moist and crunchy, cigars great with the dip and the man was perfect. Wonderful atmosphere with the open kitchen and great music selections. Just great.

Lovely relaxed atmosphere with soft music in background. Tables are a bit too close . Service is fast yet not pushy or business like. Food I tried was perfectly cooked, right balance of flavours. Portions on the smallish sides

North African / Middle Eastern food made in front of you with live fire. This fun little gem in Neal's Yard is mainly all bar, so you can watch the food being made in front of you. It was hard to pick what I wanted to eat, as everything on the menu looked amazing. It did not disappoint. The Bavette Steak with Chermoula had me craving for more!

From the moment we walked into The Barbary we knew we would have an amazing night. The music was such fun, staff were so friendly and the restaurant was so chic. Alex looked after us and talked through the menu, making sure my intolerances were catered for. Merci Alex!  The counter tables are fantastic and so cool to watch the chefs at work. Really recommend everything we ate; the naan, cods roe, hummus, cigars, sea bream and pork. The wine list was so unique too! Really fantastic evening, thank you!

A chance last day delight - the best meal with the best service in our entire 3 week UK visit. The food was fantastic and what could be better than sitting looking into the kitchen, literally right in front of us, where the delightful chefs shared their expertise. Every dish was richly flavored, beautifully presented and absolutely delicious. I wish it was not our very last day - Id be back in a shot.

We went for lunch here and were really impressed, the food was incredible. We started with a selection of dips with the hummus being a particular favourite and then moved onto the mains with our favourites being the lamb and the octopus though everything was delicious. Finally desserts to finish with the hashcake (sort of a pistachio tart) being the standout. Service was friendly and helpful too, talking through the dishes and giving recommendations and we never felt rushed at all. My only tip though is booking as it can be hard to get a table (and having eaten there, I see why!).

Whether you're headed here to check out the multitude of shops, theaters, cafes, pubs, and restaurants, or simply to be among the multitude of people who pass through this pretty part of town, you'll love soaking up the festive and historic atmosphere in and around Covent Garden. Even if you don't have tickets to the opera or a show at one of the many famous theaters here, don't be surprised if find yourself captivated by some impromptu act of a street performer wowing the crowds in Covent Garden's Piazza. If you do have tickets, you'll be pleased to note that many of the local eateries accommodate theatergoers with prix fixe menus, early dinners, and later than usual opening hours.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
2nd time Ive been to this cafe. Amazing breakfast good size highly recommend.   Reasonably priced and friendly staff. A*
Affordable, good portion size and friendly service. We had the set breakfast and a side of chips. The cafe was busy but service was quick. Would return if we were in the area again.

This breakfast restaurant offers a warm, welcoming atmosphere with freshly prepared meals that feel both comforting and satisfying. The menu has a great variety, from classic breakfasts to lighter options, and the food is served hot and well presented. The staff are friendly and attentive, making the overall experience enjoyable and worth returning for.
Great cafe, very friendly staff. Tez was a lovely server! Would throughly recommend to anyone visiting for a proper old school breakfast.
Food was good! We really had a great time, the atmosphere was good, the environment was nice and the food was great so overall a good time
10/10 breakfast and best service ever from Tez!   Great customer service and I would highly recommend the Mediterranean breakfast
Very good food, proper greasy spoon cafe. Service was great, loved the vibe of the place. Would recommend if youre in the area

Cosy, simple caf with a really authentic, family vibe. Small dining area, but it just feels nice and welcoming. Halil, the host, was a fantastic guychatty, friendly, and cracking jokes while serving. Had the mixed dner platter; massive portion and super fresh and tasty.

Halil was amazing he really took care of us and made us laugh. The food was amazing he recommended for me to put cheese into my omelette and it made the world of a difference. Very lovely cafe with reasonable prices. Would definitely come here again.
Great jacket pot - massive tasty and cheap - nice atmosphere nice waiters - visited in lunch break with basement orchestra
Nice food, cheap price, VERY friendly staff who took the time to speak to us and make us welcome. Its located not far from Vauxhall and Kennington and is just opposite a nice park.
The food is very tasty and the staff very friendly. Ita a cozy and nice place to visit, thank you a lot guys. I will come back here
Excellent local greasy spoon that I regularly visit. Great food, quickly served & very friendly service. Couldn't recommend enough

Fantastic genuine London Caf. Quick service from a delightful server. Sausages are to die for, REAL rashers (not the processed type). Fried bread which unfortunately you dont readily get anymore.   The value is incredible considering the amount of food.   Well done !!!!!!!!!
Beautiful home cooked food, friendly service from Halil. Would definitely highly recommend and the prices are really reasonable.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.

Such a lovely pub to have a delicious Sunday roast, i came with here with my family and i must say service was 10/10 shout out to sheila the barmaid she was so sweet and always on her toes.  Definitely returning for more!
A good place for drinking and eating something. The decor is beautiful and the food is very good. The people are good too.
Ro the waitress is amazing and Sunday roast is best in town, the roast lamb is fabulous.Always come back!!!!!! Love the Prince of wales.
Ro was fantastic, great energy, lovely good food, very happy customer. Can't recommend enough
Excellent service from Ro who was lovely  friendly and chatty.Beautiful experience.

The Sunday roast dinner was amazing! We had the chicken roast and everything was delicious. We also had the crumble with custard for dessert and it was great too. We werent sure we had the right place when we walked in as it seems like a spot for locals but everyone was nice and the service and food was great!

The Prince of Wales is conveniently located near my hotel. After a long day of travel, I was looking f forward to a pint and a nice lunch. The BLT is fresh and the onion rings are on par with any American restaurant. A good selection of beers too. The bartender was attentive and friendly. Great location too right off of High Street Kensington
Great food, good value and service by Ro excellent. Guinness at a good temperature and the Merlot and Shiraz was great  GRL

We went to Prince of Wales for the Sunday roast after a day of museum hopping. What a pleasure to sit in the bar and eat such a delicious beef roast with all the trimmings. The owner, we think... Tom? Welcomed us. There was a birthday going on in the corner table and two couples in a banquette. Such a charming atmosphere. By the time we left we had shared our sticky toffee pudding and were offered a sluce of birthday cake.  We went back for lunch another say and the fish and chips were delicious and Sheila a lovely, attentive server.  We will be back! A call out to the nice lady in the kitchen. Thank you from Southern California.
Ro was brilliant - amazing service - great food too - a lovely local London pub. Tom is a brilliant landlord. Well be back

We booked here for our sons suprise 21st Birthday party and couldnt recommend it enough - Tom, Margaret and the team helped with everything from putting up all of the decorations for us to ordering the DJ in (Smokey was great) and the food was absolutely delicious. The place is in a great location and is spotless, everyone was warm and welcoming and 100% recommend you use this place THANK YOU!
Bar staff especially the male member with basic skill, food on the other hand was lovely compliments to the chef please.
Food was excellent, staff was very friendly. Ro was our server and she was lovely, very helpful. We had a great evening!!

Its been a great experience and the food was delicious. The atmosphere is really lovely and warm. Our waitress Ro has been super friendly and gives us some tips for Karaoke. We will definitely be back .

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: This is a classy restaurant with great service, great food and great views. The team are really attentive and unobstructive and take great care with special requirements.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: We havent been here for a while, but it is still being exactly what you want from a good restaurant. We came for lunch and the menu was delightfully short, but with plenty of choice. The crab on a potato waffle was delicious, and the stracciatella with poached pears was a really wonderful surprise. One of us had a most tender and nicely cooked fillet of beef with mushrooms and the Shetland halibut was amazing.  Paired with an excellent wine and a small digestif, we left comfortably full and very relaxed. Service was kind and friendly. This isnt a place to come to if youre on a budget, but if you want to splash out, it is worth the money in our view.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: A simply extraordinary dining experience at Londons OXO Restaurant, where elegance, technique and sensitivity coexist in perfect balance. Each dish tells a story made of excellent raw materials, great aesthetic care and impeccable room service: attentive, discreet and always smiling.  Special applause goes to the Scottish Langoustine dish, carrot, ginger, shellfish aioli, which literally left me speechless. I only tasted a few bites off my girlfriend's plate, and I was astonished.  A dish of great style and precision, where the following coexist harmoniously:  Elegant carrot sweetness  Spicy aromatic ginger, never intrusive  Intense and clean sea depth of langoustine  Controlled and enveloping fatness of shellfish aioli  A rare, refined, memorable balance.  Precisely because of the emotion that this dish gave me, I allow myself a curiosity as a great enthusiast: I would love to be able to recreate it for my girlfriend one day. Would it be possible to know, even if only in outline, the recipe or philosophy of the dish? In particular, I would like to know if inside the zucchini cannolo there are only scampi or even other fish or crustaceans, and what is the meaning and technique of the yellow lines on the zucchini, which are very intriguing both from an aesthetic and taste point of view. A more in-depth description would really be a gift.  Definitely I will be back, and will definitely recommend this restaurant to all my friends who will come to London: OXO is a must for those who love great cuisine.  Sincere congratulations to the kitchen and the service of the room. Thank you very much for this beautiful dining experience, which I will carry with me for a long time.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Great atmosphere , good food and friendly staff. Easy location to find with a great view.amazing cocktails.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Lovely pre theatre dinner. Took advantage of the 3 courses and glass of prosecco for 35. Excellent value even with the dishes and wine we added on. Lovely attentive service, didn't feel at all rushed. Having read negative reviews about the temperature of the space we were slightly concerned but needn't have been, in fact was on the very warm side. Food excellent  and portions large (couldn't finish dessert). Great.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: If you're going to eat here, you should definitely bring blankets. With an outside temperature of 1 degree, it is not more than 15 degrees inside. In addition, a fresh wind blows from the air conditioning, which quickly makes the good food cold. At a price of 560 for four people, the explanation of the service doesn't help either that there's a lot of glass around and that's why it's so cold.... Well, we're not coming back... maybe in the summer

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: I was with my family for dinner, unrefined environment with New Year's Eve arrangements from paese.Personale unkind and a menu with prices absolutely out of the norm compared to what is proposed on the plate. To ask for certain prices you have to have a chef in the kitchen who is able to cook in a certain way and in the room of kind people. I absolutely do not recommend this place, the view is beautiful but not enough. I felt fooled.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Lovely food, great service, relaxed. Reassuringly excellent comms beforehand.   Everything about our visit was excellent and hit just the right note for a post-graduation celebration meal.   We were asked beforehand if it was a special occasion and my daughter felt very special that she was greeted with congratulations at reception. The dessert option with a message piped on rounded things off perfectly.  Every single person we encountered, from outside the lift arriving to when we left, was friendly, courteous and really excellent at what they were doing. A super standard of food. We were really grateful for the window seating, which we had not requested and was a real bonus in making our daughters day memorable. As the Principal at her graduation said to them all, we dont know your whole stories and what it took for you to make it through to now, but we see you. Our daughter deserved her day, and our time in the brasserie added perfectly to it.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Lovely view, friendly vibe, attentive helpful staff and gorgeous food!! Fish and sea food tasty and fresh. Will definitely revisit!

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: The service was great, well catered for and checked upon frequently but not often enough to be annoying. We went for Afternoon Tea. The menu was as expected and the Salmon (my weakness) was perfect. The tea selection was large but the options were very similar. Scenery was ideal as we watched the contrast from a bright day to night views (3pm to 5pm). A bit pricey and would have rather been asked to donate to charity rather than it be included on the bill without any forewarning.  The Xmas crackers at 3.75ea (inc a donation) were VERY basic, not something I would associate with Harvey Nichols, more Poundland. Overall, a nice experience for me and my partner.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: One of our favourite restaurants in London and we booked for our Christmas meal with close friends. Unfortunately we were surprised at the greatly increased prices compared with our last visit a few months ago. Seems they were exploiting Christmas time. The service was excellent as usual but our meals were only average For example, my friend and I chose halibut which came with a few vegetables was 49 excluding sides. The piece of fish was very small and virtually tasteless. A great disappointment. Perhaps the word had got around because for a Friday night close to Christmas the restaurant was less than half full

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Probably the best view of St Paul's Cathedral from anywhere, but it isn't worth the price. Starters all cost more than 20 - for two scallops? - and 46 for a piece of under-seasoned halibut not much bigger than my thumb, sitting in an insipid green sauce.   All this is probably reflected in the place being half empty on the Friday before Christmas. It's a pity because we've eaten well there previously and the location is great. Service was good. The room was cold, I'm not sure whether this was due to aircon too high or heating too low.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Its been a few years since I was here and I had been many times before that. The crab starter on a potato waffle was dire. The waffle was more like a stale reheated spongecake. The main dish of Pork was lukewarm as if it had been cooked on a radiator. The crushed potatoes were unremarkable and also cold, the cauliflower arrived 5 mins after we started eating and guess what? Was stone cold but it was taken off the bill. Staff are super lovely, but the service was far too quick, I think wed had both courses in 45 mins.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Just wanted to say thank you for yesterday  really appreciate all the support and everyone being so accommodating.  The dinner was lovely and the team really enjoyed it!

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: Our afternoon tea was superb, including the offer of a glass of champagne. We tried hard to resist but two seconds later we said Yes! The service was excellent and the staff very helpful in terms of our onward journey.

Restoran: OXO Tower Restaurant, Bar and Brasserie
Recenzija: This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
Great fresh pasta restaurant Its delicious  The staff is very friendly Only downside is the noise with the world and the music

We asked what dishes were vegetarian on arriving and the waiter was very helpful and ticked all that applied, as it isnt listed on the menu. When we came to ordering, he asked us if we wanted extra parmesan.   With parmesan generally not vegetarian, we were surprised by the question so enquired. His response was well, its personal preference as to whether you consider it vegetarian or not. But it contains animal rennet. We dont consider it non-vegetarian here.   Seems so strange to me that a restaurant like this is passing off parmesan with animal rennet in it as vegetarian, but this is really poor and an exceptional lack of awareness and training. And then turned out that some of the dishes that had been indicated to us on the menu as vegetarian, such as the pumpkin ravioli, had parmesan within it.   Having changed our order, the food we did get to me was overrated compared to what I expected. The pasta dishes are small and the only standout was the chilli pasta - the cacio e pepe was disappointing, as was the cavolo nero dish which was bland. Wouldnt return.

Ciao sbrady123, I hope you are doing well. Thanks for taking time to give us your feedback, and Im sorry you didnt find your experience as good as your expectations. This is definitely not the way we like to take care of our customers, giving the wrong information or not being specific when it comes to food requirement. I would like to investigate better about your visit to our restaurant and having a proper chat with my staff. Please reach out to my email for that: francesco.c@padella.co I wish you a good weekend. Francesco.

Net of the discomfort resulting from the fact that they do not accept reservations and then you have to mark yourself at the entrance and wait (for a good hour) for the table to clear, anyone who was catapulted by Pan blindfolded, would think they were in Italy... Italian cuisine is of a very high level, fresh pasta that resembles those made by mom, tasty sauces, but delicate. The top is value for money, well above the London average. In our living room, we had such a good time, that we had dinner twice. For Italians in London who are abstinent from flour and eggs, this is the place!
Lunch at borough market restaurant. Very good homemade pasta and very friendly staff. I recommend for a quick lunch
padella was an experience by self .   great pastas, freshly made from scratch in front of you, a must visit restaurant in london

My friend and I had a pre-Christmas lunch in the Shoreditch Padella. The staff were so lovely and attentive with ordering and bringing water. The food was delicious we both had the Dorset crab pasta with a glass of wine and then shared a lemon tart which was amazing and so velvety. The portion sizes were perfect. The restaurant had a great vibe and was busy, I was glad I booked. Would definitely recommend.
I loved every bit of my food at padella. Freshly made in front of you with fresh ingredients. A experience unique from rest . A must visit in london
A very tiny restaurant and you use a QR code to get a table. Its worth the effort as the food and service is amazing. Highly recommended

Beautiful Food - 100% worth a visit!  We came across this place while we were in London trying to find somewhere near to where we are staying. There is a virtual queue to go in which to me is a good sign. We got a text when our table was ready and were served by a really lovely waitress who was friendly and informative. We had gorgeous starters and pasta mains which were both very very good and just the right amount.  I would say this place is a must when you are in the area and not expensive either! We shall return!!

Another tuck-your-elbows-in spot and we loved it. Its a lively and tight space serving some great food. The menu offers a great selection of handmade pastas, with as well antipasti, puddings and digestivi to choose from. We kicked things off with the Nocellara olives and radicchio salad then moved onto Pici cacio e pepe and the Pappardelle with 8-hour Dexter beef shin rag. Everything was wonderful!  Anticipate a queue, we did not and waited a while outside with others.

Never disappoints- service always great, food is vv good and prices have remained impressively reasonable. Waiters are super friendly and accommodating, atmosphere is always buzzing. Portions are good and the pasta is excellent quality. Also a big fan of the reservation system which allows turning up an hour before eating and strolling along southbank until your table is ready. Will always keep coming back here. Recommend the rag and the tagliolini, do not skip the tiramisu.

Great food, friendly service, just a really nice little place for a good catch up with a friend. They don't take bookings but have a virtual queuing system you can join, so you don't have to stand for a long time waiting outside.
Great food, great staff, wasntt so keen on my wine choice..but restaurant all in all great
Got a table last minute and it was worth it. Food was delish, 10 out of 10. Spend money on the food because its teally good. Went for the cheapest wine, thought it was pricey and it was ok

Nice and informal location near Borough Market, very convenient because we did not wait in line but they recorded us and called us with a text message when the table was freed!  The pasta is excellent as in Italy, special cheese and pepper! We were greeted by Francesco super nice and sympathetic who advised us and even offered coffee!

Book in and join a virtual queue. It said 60 mins but it was only about 30 to 40 before we were messaged, and seated. There are very few tables. Most seating is on stools either around the kitchen, or the window. We were seated looking into the kitchen. It was fascinating watching the food being prepared. Everyone doing their job so quickly and proficiently. We all had different pasta dishes, and everyone thoroughly enjoyed what they had. The food was well presented and delicious. The staff were very friendly and helpful, explaining patiently when we were unsure what a dish contained.

Even before the arrival of the instantly iconic Shard, the riverside scene in Southwark had moved well beyond any up-and-coming phase of development. For quite some time, locals and out-of-towners alike have loved browsing the boutiques of Bermondsey High Street, foraging through the bounteous stalls at centuries old foodie haven Borough Market, and flocking to the banks of the Thames to enjoy some of Britain's biggest attractions such as Tate Modern and Shakespeare's Globe. Despite Southwark's many popular draws, instant calm can be achieved easily by turning down almost any side street. For more urban buzz, a quick stroll across famed bridges like the pedestrianized Millennium Bridge or the ever photogenic Tower Bridge yields access to the very core of Central London. And with London Bridge Station as this neighborhood's main transportation hub, getting across town (or to anywhere in England for that matter) is a relative breeze.

We came in for a beer and a snack after seeing Buckingham Palace. The staff was wonderful, the beer was phenomenal, and the chips were to die for. I dont have the Sunday roast but that looked wicked good. Id def come back when Im in the area

Wonderful pub with a cozy vibe, great service, and excellent food. Fish and chips were delicious and the homemade brownie was surprisingly good! Shout out to Jim our great server! We will be back on our next trip to London.

Hello there,  Thank you for the kind words. It's great to hear that you have enjoyed your recent visit to our lovely pub. The chefs will be happy to hear that you have enjoyed our famou fish and chips and the homemade chocolate brownie! The Team here does its best to go above and beyond to ensure our guests become a part of the Buckingham Arms. Reviews like this keep us motivated about what we do here! Please spread the word to your family and friends we're constantly looking to expand our family here at the Buckingham Arms.  Have a lovely week!  Aga & Team Buckingham Arms.
I had the lamb Sunday roast for dinner. The food is excellent, reasonable price and the service is so amazing!! Nice place for Sunday roast and beer

Aga & Team Buckingham Arms

What a great pub! We went there for a Sunday Roast and it was delicious! Great beer, great food, great people and great atmosphere!! Jim was a gem of a guy. We were obviously American and didnt quite know the British way to order in a pub. He was kind and quite helpful!! I highly recommend!!

Hi Martina,  An amazing British pub is what we love to hear! We greatly benefit from being located right next to Buckingham Palace, which provides us with the opportunity to meet lovely people from all over the world, such as yourselves. Chefs will be happy to hear that you have enjoyed our delicious Sunday roasts! I will pass along your comments to Jim; he'll be thrilled to know.  We hope to see you again soon. Have a great week!  Aga & Team Buckingham Arms.

The Buckingham Arms is an absolutely darling place to share a meal with those you care about. We enjoyed the Kings Roast for two, but honestly it could feed four. The truffled mac & cheese is also a savoury delight. The staff were very attentive and kind. The atmosphere here is cosy and inviting. Its easy to stay here for a couple of rounds more than you planned for. Id also like to give a special shout out to Jim for parking our stroller inside and taking good care of our toddler.

Hi Sky, Thank you for the kind words. It's great to hear that you have enjoyed your recent visit to our lovely pub. We are proud of our heritage and our delcious food! The Team here does its best to go above and beyond to ensure our guests become a part of the Buckingham Arms. Reviews like this keep us motivated about what we do here! I will pass along your comments to Jim- he'll be thrilled to know . Please spread the word to your family and friends, as we're constantly looking to expand our family here at the Buckingham Arms.  Have a lovely week!  Aga & Team Buckingham Arms.
Amazing experience! Great food (we had the chicken and beef Sunday roast) and lovely atmosphere . Jim was super friendly also! Would 100% recommend.
Hi Irina, thank you for the amazing 5-star review. Have a wonderful day  Team Bucks
The place has a nice old English pub vibe. Good place to stop when in between checking out buckingham palace and Westminster abbey. Great service and good.

Hello Michael  Old English pub vibe is the name of the game here at The Buckingham Arms. The team do their best to ensure the service is top-notch and all of our guests feel welcome into our little family; which is constantly growing! We can't wait to have you back.  All the best, Team Buckingham Arms.
What a great pub. We received a warm welcome from the team, loved the lively, friendly atmosphere and enjoyed the exceptional venison pie. Next time were in the area well definitely be back.

Hello Natalie  What a great pub is what we love and aim to hear! Just as much as we love meeting amazing customers, such as yourself! The pies are home-made and all of our ingredients are locally sourced therefore reviews like this make us proud of what we're doing! We can't wait to welcome you back! Please tell your friends and family so The Buckingham Arms family can expand.  All the best, Silvana

We were here on the 3rd. Evening of our trip. After the two first evenings were rather an expensive disappointment, it was a very nice evening at Buckingham Arms!  Even the nice welcome and the service by the very dedicated host was a pleasure. Ordering and paying later was also much easier than usual in the pub. In addition to the many beers on tap, there is a small but fine selection of wines. My wife said the burger was the best she ever had. Even better than in France. And I was very lucky that it was Sunday. I had heard of the Sunday Roast many times, but it exceeded all my expectations, tender, juicy and to the point. A Sunday evening in this pub we can only recommend.

Hello there,  Ein so tolles britisches Pub  das freut uns riesig! Wir profitieren sehr von unserer Lage direkt neben dem Buckingham Palace, die uns die Mglichkeit gibt, nette Menschen aus aller Welt kennenzulernen, so wie Sie. Unsere Kche freuen sich bestimmt, dass Ihnen unsere kstlichen Sonntagsbraten geschmeckt haben! Wir hoffen, Sie hatten einen schnen restlichen Aufenthalt in London. Eine schne Woche! Aga & Team Buckingham Arms

Really enjoyed our meal here. Made to welcome and valued as soon as we walked in. We both the had the Sunday roast which was Hugh. We also enjoyed glasses of an excellent Merlot. We will definitely return when we next come to London.
Great atmosphere. Loved the fish and chips. Waiter was friendly and helpful. Would recommend!

Great pub with friendly atmosphere and welcoming staff. Good beer with quite a few pumps to chose from. I like that we could book a table in advance and that the music was at the right level to let us have a conversation. Well be back.

Hello there,  Charming pub is the name of the game. We're proud of the history you see floating around the pub, as well as our guests, who appreciate what we're aiming for! Leaving happy is what we love to aim for and achieve. We can't wait to have you back. Have a great weekend!  Aga & Team Buckingham Arms
Jim was very kind and helpful with recommendations! Food was amazing, the guinness pie was our favorite.
Hi Katie, Thank you for the five stars! We will be sure to pass on your lovely review to Jim. Team Buckingham Arms
Wonderful place, food and service. Silv was most helpful with menu explanations and suggestions. Will gladly come back and recommend to others...

Hello there!  Thank you for such a wonderful review. The team are always on hand for top teir suggestions and friendly service to ensure you feel comfortable in our lovely pub. We can't wait to have you back.  All the best, Team Buckingham Arms.
Brilliant roasts all round for my sisters birthday! Very friendly and attentive staff, Jim was great! Would definitely recommend! Cosy atmosphere!

Hello Emma  Thanks for the kind words. Thrilled you enjoyed a cracking Sunday roast here at The Buckingham Arms. We love serving up locally sourced food, with great service as an added bonus! We can't wait to have you back.  All the best, Team Buckingham Arms.

If you only had an afternoon to experience London on a grand scale, Westminster would be a wise place to start. The ornate Houses of Parliament and Westminster Abbey sit adjacent at a corner of Parliament Square, and a short stroll along The Mall leads to Buckingham Palace. Trafalgar Square and Nelson's Column are just up the road as well. As captivating as the architecture is, the wonders of Mother Nature are highlights of the area too. St James's Park (arguably London's loveliest), the expansive Green Park, and pedestrian friendly tree lined paths along the river showcase the exquisite manicure provided by English gardeners. Just beyond the landmarks and the gorgeous outdoor spaces, quiet residential squares and age old local pubs offer a more subdued take on this global seat of power in the heart of London.

Have to say this place has up the levels since i last came with new dishes on the menu which unfortunately i dodnt get a chance to try.   I brought my friend to try out the breakfast OMG dish and the other dish with the french toast it was absolutely amazing, the decor, the atmosphere was very relaxing a good place to chill and catch up whilst indulging in great food.   The pictures on their website match exactly as you see it in reality. There's a free parking area 5 mins down the road for 2 hrs or right opposite manor house station.    Zena was a great hostess and was very helpful telling is about the history of the shop and what are the go too dishes. Would definitely recommend to try it out, big upgrade on your normal cafe would be very silly not to try this place out.
The food, drinks, service & atmosphere were all 12/10. Easily one of the best breakfasts in London, such attention to detail. zena served us and was so friendly and kind. We will def be back
We had a really nice experience... The English breakfast was unexpected WAW  I recommended for everybody (specially french people) . We had really good advices from Zeyno for the brunch
Very friendly service.  Cozy place to have breakfast.  Dish, land and sea was very nicely presented and very tasty. More than enough.  Definitely recommended.

This is my third time going to Dobar when I travel England London with my family. This time we went on Sunday at 12.00 midday. There was a little bit of a queue but I know from previous visits that it was worth the wait ( which wasn't more than 5/10 mins). The staff are so happy and friendly and apologized for the wait but sat us and served us very speedily. The service is fast, not rushed although they know more people are waiting outside. The food is amazing and I mean it when I say that it is the best brunch I have ever had anywhere, for that reason I go back even though this time we was in a hotel on the other side of London. It will always be my go to place on my visits to London if they keep up with this quality and service. Thanks. I will dream of your brunches until next time I can visit.

First time at Dobar and I would definitely return. The staff are warm and courteous. The food came moments after ordering, so no long wait. The environment is cosy. Not loud. You can have a good conversation while you're there. An added plus is that it is literally a step from the Manor House Station.
Excellent service and food of superb quality with great presentation. The staff is super attentive and concerned about the customer's well-being.

Friendly and welcoming staff and the the food was very tasty and fresh. This place has not change from the last time I visited and cannot recommend it enough. Even though it is not my local, I make the trip over to enjoy the experience of a great breakfast
food was the best service on point served by Memet - great guy got the french toast - fuit was fresh aswell,  overall great experience
The food and drinks were great. The service was first class - friendly and prudent but not intrusive!

Stopped in for a late lunch and was pleasantly surprised. The service was fast and friendly, and the food was fresh and delicious. I had the chicken sandwichand it was perfect. Great atmosphere for a casual meal. Will definitely be back next time I'm in the area
Lovely service, very attentive. Food is good. Hot drinks are lovely, warm and heartfelt. Food decor well! Fruits are fresh. The waitress Zeynep was great and welcoming.

We then ate at Dobar! Food was very good, menu selection was good and the staff of the restaurant was very friendly particularly Danilo. The service by Danilo added all the more to our enjoyment of the visit. We can not wait to come back with our next visit to Liverpool!
The food was great and it came pretty quick. Zeynep was a amazing server. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.
Great service by the waitress Zeynep and amazing food and drinks. Everything came very quickly. Very friendly atmosphere :)

Great Greek restaurant in London, amazing food and fabulous service from Andy .All the credits to the staff and the location is perfect
Fantastic food and service. Everything is homemade! We had very nice outside seats, and the owners made us feel at home.
Great food,amazing exprecience, staff very friendly! and has such good vibes! There was really a nice atmosphere! Its a must to go dine there when youre in London!

Amazing find, the best atmosphere. The best Greek food in huge portions, feels like a family run taverna. Please tell the restaurant when booking if someone in your party is celebrating their birthday  Cannot recommend enough, must visit if you're interested Camden.
Beautiful evening. Delicious food! And Andy was so helpful and the whole team same me happy birthday and brought some desert! I would highly recommend for an evening out.
Amazing food and atmosphere. Couldnt recommend it more. Andy was the best server. Celebrated friends birthday and was so much fun.
Lovely Cypriot style souvlaki. Always a good visit and tender meat! I visit any time Im in the area and it never disappoints
Lovely food, great atmosphere, Andy was the perfect host. We definitely be back

With a number of restaurants in the area serving similar cuisine, the fact that this one is always busy & often full, says everything you need to know.   Although the dining area is small the intimate atmosphere is pleasant. The food is freshly prepared, cooked perfectly, presented with thought & served professionally. CONGRATULATIONS to the management for the quality & consistency.   Due to the popularity you MUST book beforehand to ensure you have a table.   Will definitely return in the very near future.

We travel to London from the North East of England on a regular basis to visit family and discovered this resturant a few years back, we visit every time we are in the area and we are never disappointed. This latest visit was a very very busy Saturday evening but the service and food was 100%. The family who run it and staff are so friendly, attentive and kind.  4 people in our party shared the meze and the amount of food we got actually beat us, we had to take some of our meat course home in a takeaway box. This lovley authentic no frills Greek restaurant is without boubt the best we have visited outside Grecce and even if you have to wait a few minutes to get a table, is well worth the wait, you will not be disappointed.
The best greek food I had in London   Service was amazing,For the large group I recommend the Mezze ,
Superb experience! Good food, and excellent service from the staff. We were a large group and waited a very reasonable time for the food. Also, they go all out for birthdays (thanks!)
Food and atmosphere was great, and the servers Maria and Andy were lovely!
Delicious food and Andy was a lovely waiter. Excellent food and friendly staff

Lovely place with amazing food!  Special thanks to Andy who was excellent with his recommendations! The oysters were fresh and grilled chicken was cooked to perfection. Thank you for the great experience!

Famous for its sprawling cluster of markets and shops as well as for an embrace of all things counter culture, Camden offers a concentrated version of London street life. From bargain shopping and people watching to rubbing elbows in its abundance of pubs and bars, Camden is the place to be for many a Londoner. It is also home to some of the hottest live music venues in Europe. As packed as Camden High Street and its tributaries can get during the weekends, this neighborhood is right next to some of the city's most beloved outdoor spaces, namely Regent's Park and Primrose Hill.

Beautiful food, beautiful people running the restaurant. An all round gorgeous experience. Thank you! We will be back.

Lovely mid week dinner. Ambience and vibes were fantastic. Taste was 10/10, loved a baileys on the house to finish too. We shared the cauliflower and broccoli dishes. Maroto is billed as a Brazilian-European fusion restaurant and is a lively spot just off Oxford Street. The menu is mainly meat based, the lamb rack was excellent, but there are vegetarian and fish options and the cod/white feijao dish was perfect. The dessert list is short with the bomboca/coffee/baileys ice cream our favourite. Although the cocktail list is strong the wine list could do with beefing up with a limited choice and it was a pity the Brazilian sparkling wine was no longer available. Service was friendly and it is well worth a visit. At 65 for two courses and 75 for three as well as a 95 tasting menu be prepared to pay for the experience.
The food was absolutely delicious, and the service was excellent everything was perfectly prepared and served with great care. A wonderful dining experience overall!
Amazing restaurant, very good service and food, warm atmosphere and a lovely setting. Perfect spot highly recommend it!!! Well definitely be coming back!
Its location is very convenient as you are in the center of London. The atmosphere and the staff are excellent! Very comfortable and beautiful! The food also had very special flavors!
I had an amazing time with my friends in Maroto! Great atmosphere, very intimate environment amazing for a catch up with friends

Maroto is honestly one of the nicest spots Ive been to. The atmosphere is so cozy and welcoming, and it instantly makes you feel relaxed. The food is amazingfull of flavor, fresh, and really well cooked. Theres a good variety on the menu too, so theres something for everyone. The staff are super friendly and helpful, which makes the whole experience even better. I love how everything feels easy and comfortable, whether youre going with friends, family, or just grabbing a nice meal out. Overall, Maroto is the kind of place youll want to keep coming back to.

I had an incredible experience dining at Maroto in Mayfair. From the moment I walked in, I was struck by the stylish yet welcoming atmosphere. The staff were attentive and made me feel genuinely cared for throughout the evening. The food was outstanding  beautifully presented and bursting with flavour. I loved how each main came with a variety of sauces, offering a perfect balance of tastes. My personal highlight was the tender pork belly, though the prawns and desserts were equally impressive. Everything felt refined without being pretentious. Maroto is truly a memorable restaurant that I cant wait to revisit.
Moroto Restaurant offers a wonderful dining experience with delicious food, warm service, and a welcoming atmospherehighly recommend!" Very nice location
So good to be true The food, ambience  First time tried and my family loved the atmosphere, will come back soon again, Aaron the manager looked after us so well
Had a friends birthday here, from the service to the food to the drinks. They also have a club downstairs which is great because you can stay in the same venue
Came here for dinner with some girlfriends! Cant recommend enough. Food , drinks. Service were out of this world ! Thank you so much again
Such a perfect experience! Great food, great ambience, great staff too. The bone marrow meal is amazing and I cant wait to go back for it, ended the day with the yummiest dessert
Great experience! The food was fresh and tasty, and the service was wonderful. Highly recommend this lovely restaurant to everyone!
Amazing food good vibes. You should try we wrre with friends we enjoyed a lot and waiters are so kind and fast to deliver food
The food was amazing, really high quality and well presented. The service in the restaurant was friendly and helpful. Great vibe!

Passed by this lovely restaurant established in 1978. The food is so amazing. And super thanks to Sultan for his great service! Will definitely come back soon:)
Great service from Sultan as soon as we entered the restaurant. We had chicken curry and mixed tandoori. All very nice and tasty.
Delicious food and very attentive staff. We enjoyed the set menu, it was very good value for money, loads of food and complimentary drink at the end of meal was very appreciated.
Amazing food was fantastic, staff very friendly, especially siam looked after us very well . You weren't bothered whilst eating either , music in background
Siam was very friendly and the food was classic Indian fare which we both enjoyed. Nothing too spicy but good flavours. Recommended
Location super! The atmosphere is perfect for a couple. Food was really good. Service top, Siam was super kind and cute.
Great dinner, personal gentiles, especially sultan. refined cuisine but also simple recommended!! if you like Indian cuisine don't miss
Really good food! Will definitely come again! Specials made to order and changes to dishes done with special attention to detail.
Lovely service from sultan and great food. Also a lovely atmosphere, would recommend. Big up the man sultan, Id come back just for the lassi.
Delicious food, made sure everyones preferred spice levels were respected and everything was perfect! Thank you Alil for checking in on all of us to make sure we were happy and full!
A lovely evening with friends and family. The staff are wonderful. The chicken tikkka masala is great and spicy too just how I like it. The setting is also very calm and relaxed
A wonderful atmosphere and restaurant in Tower Bridge road. Great food with wonderful service. We really couldnt fault it. Parking available too outside
Amazing food and fantastic service from Sultan. I would really recommend a visit
The food was absolutely incredible and the whole staff was very welcoming and warm, including our server Sultan.

Even before the arrival of the instantly iconic Shard, the riverside scene in Southwark had moved well beyond any up-and-coming phase of development. For quite some time, locals and out-of-towners alike have loved browsing the boutiques of Bermondsey High Street, foraging through the bounteous stalls at centuries old foodie haven Borough Market, and flocking to the banks of the Thames to enjoy some of Britain's biggest attractions such as Tate Modern and Shakespeare's Globe. Despite Southwark's many popular draws, instant calm can be achieved easily by turning down almost any side street. For more urban buzz, a quick stroll across famed bridges like the pedestrianized Millennium Bridge or the ever photogenic Tower Bridge yields access to the very core of Central London. And with London Bridge Station as this neighborhood's main transportation hub, getting across town (or to anywhere in England for that matter) is a relative breeze.

Shanghai Family () is one of the few places in London where you can taste truly authentic Shanghainese cuisine

Shanghai Family () is one of the few places in London where you can taste truly authentic Shanghainese cuisine, and Ive already gone back several times. The braised pork belly is rich but not greasy and literally melts in your mouth; the pan-fried soup dumplings have thin skins, crispy bottoms and plenty of broth; and the new claypot dishes come with a flavorful, comforting broth and generous ingredients (including egg dumplings, which instantly reminded me of home). The Mao Xue Wang has a well-balanced spicy and numbing kick without being overly oily, and pairs perfectly with rice. The restaurant is clean, dishes come out quickly, the average price is around 30 per person, and the location next to the British Museum is very convenient. If youre craving genuine Shanghainese food in London, this place is absolutely worth trying.

Shanghai Family is a restaurant in London where you can get an authentic taste of Shanghai. I've had it many times. Red roast meat fat but not greasy, mouth instant, raw fried buns thin, crisp bottom, ample juice; new casserole series soup head fresh, rich ingredients (actually there are dumplings, people feel instantly home)

This restaurant is definitely going on my list of Chinese places Id happily return to. We ordered the sizzling spicy pork intestines, xiaolongbao, and scallion oil noodles, and every dish was spot on. The spicy intestines arrived in a fragrant pool of chili oil with a bold, layered numbing-spicy kick that wasnt just harsh heat; the intestines were cleaned really well with virtually no off smell, and the texture was pleasantly chewy yet tender and incredibly flavorful. The xiaolongbao had thin skins that held up nicely, with plenty of savory broth and juicy, fresh filling that wasnt greasy; a little vinegar made them even better, and we immediately wanted another basket. The scallion oil noodles looked simple but were deeply aromatic, with a balanced savory sauce and springy noodles that coated evenly in every bite. Overall, the flavors were authentic and the quality was consistent, satisfying, comforting, and highly recommended.

I like Family Feast Hot Pot best The moment this pot arrived at the table, you just knew it was something special. The prawns were incredibly fresh. The handmade egg dumplings were a real highlight  one bite and it instantly brought back familiar, comforting flavors from home. The meatballs were a pleasant surprise: fragrant, tender, and absolutely delicious. Add to that the glass noodles and pork tripe, each soaked up the broth beautifully. The soup base was rich yet not greasy, clean and deeply savory. For a moment, it truly felt like being home again.

A lovely Chinese restaurant with authentic flavours and generous portions. The dishes were well-seasoned and clearly freshly prepared, especially the mains, which stood out for their depth of flavour. Service was friendly and attentive without being intrusive, and the atmosphere was relaxed and welcoming. A great spot for both casual meals and small gatherings. Would happily return.

Solid Shanghainese food and very satisfying overall. The dishes were tasty, comforting, and felt quite authentic  especially the braised pork and dumplings. Portions were decent and everything came out hot and fresh. Service was quick and friendly. Would happily come back when craving Shanghai-style food.

Come over with a friend to try this Shanghainese food and the experience is very good. The service is warm and the food is fast. We ordered the signature little cage bag and raw frying bag, which tasted amazing and had a rich soup. To go with it, a refreshing little stir-fry of lotus pond (with lotus flakes and murine ears) was also ordered, and the ingredients were fresh. It's really nice to eat such an authentic home flavor here, and will come often!

Spectacular staffs. Very patient with providing recommendations.   Food arrived very swiftly, and the food was absolutely on point. Great representation of shanghai food.   Cannot praise enough of the braised pork belly which was served on a plate with candle below to keep it warm. Absolutely on point  Overall, great service nice environment with a fair price.

Really enjoyed the very authentic Shanghai cuisine. I would say it's a rare find in the heart of London and it's just too perfect place to dine before watching devil wears prada !!! The braised pork belly is so tender and flavourful and all the traditional dishes just brings me back to China
London's authentic Shanghai flavor, raw frying buns small cage buns must order

As someone who has an attachment to Shanghai snacks, this store really gives me so much satisfaction. It's near the UCL and the location is great. Their raw frying buns were deliberately ordered, with a thin, crisp bottom, and a bite to go down juicy, very authentic! Small cage buns are also excellent, with thin skins and fresh soup. It also ordered a Dongpo meat with rice, stewed soft and sticky, fat and not greasy. Definitely a five-star recommended treasure restaurant!
Beer duck is delicious Crab meat soup dumplings are also delicious; they burst with juice in every bite. The environment is nice, and they play good songs. The waiters were very warm and patient.
I went there with my family and all of us enjoyed the dinner there. Every dish was very delicious. Its definitely my top 3 Chinese restaurant in London.
As a Chinese grew up near Shanghai, their dishes are authentic. I like the xiaolongbao a lot, reminded me of home ! The service is quite good.
For Winter Solstice and Christmas, we wanted a place where friends could gather and celebrate together. We felt warm and welcoming here
Super delicious food. I like the noodle with the yellow fish the best. The pan fried bun is authentic as well. And the price is sensible. Just gonna put the restaurant on my take-out list.

superb table, friendly and professional service I highly recommend Philippe

We were looking for a Lebanese restaurant with my girlfriend and we did not regret our choice. Nestled in a quiet little street in the Marais, this restaurant is already our heart! An impeccable service despite the high attendance, and the waiters are good advisors. I recommend 100%!!
Best Lebanese restaurant we have tasted and I can tell you that we have tasted quite a lot in Paris! Special mention at Tabuleh reminds me of my grandmother's!

The best lunch in Paris!  Thanks to Martin, the waiter who followed us and advised us in a perfect way both on the quantity and on the dishes to try.  Well-kept and welcoming place, prepared and very kind staff, delicious food: the quality of the products is excellent and the dishes delicious.  We had a mixed appetizer and chicken with rice. The portions are generous.  A special mention also for the dessert, a memorable MOUHALABIA.  An experience we will remember for a long time!
Fine, authentic dinner in friendly surroundings. A great, good choice for both meat eaters and vegetarians. The service was very nice and helpful, although the restaurant was fully booked.

What a nice place! On a rainy chilly December evening we ended up in this warm and cozy restaurant. Pleasant, go-free and smooth service, with room for a chat despite being busy.   Then the dishes. We chose a selection of the chef which turned out to be a real party. Tons round and even mentally satisfied we rolled out two hours later, onto the drizzly streets of Paris

A welcome from the aging locals. Not very fine cuisine even if the quantity is there. In addition we were 2 adults and 2 children and wanted to take 2 formulas at 41 e including mezzes and skewers with accompaniment and mezzes at 31 e to share all this among us. And there the waiter served us a convoluted story that if we took 2 formulas the second formula would not include skewers....in short we felt he wanted us to spend bcp more.  In the end, everything disappointed us.
Excellent Lebanese dishes, both in quality and quantity, very warm welcome, pleasant environment, more than satisfactory value for money. Excellent service.
Very nice atmosphere. Something hidden in a side street. Nice service and great Lebanese food. Fully recommended.
Lovely dishes with good tastes  Dessert we got spanded on by the house.  I highly recommend this restaurant. Lots of food.
Very friendly service, very good food, fine ambience. Table at the door a bit cool, but I was helped with a small electric oven. Generous hospitality
Quality of food and top service. We enjoyed it. Ideal for vegetarians also thanks to the wide choice of Lebanese cuisine. Staff and boss attentive.
Excellent restaurant, deserves to be among the best by Trip Advisor! From the reception by what I think is the owner, the delicious food and the impeccable care of the friendly Saja!!!!!
The food is delicious, the service is very attentive. All this in a cozy decor. Everything is perfect. Excellent restaurant, to discover

The most amazing and welcome experience from the moment we arrived to the moment we left. We realised we had been to the other branch a year ago and Zak was looking after us then and he made such a fuss of us. Sasha was amazing with her recommendations and taking care of us at the table felt like our new happy place a home in Paris

The room is beautiful, the staff are warm and friendly, we love the open kitchen and look forward to returning next year.
