Digital Payments, Accepts credit cards: American Express, Mastercard, Visa
Is it a fixed menu? Do you cater for vegetarian and vegan options. My wife does not eat fish meat or eggs.
Is it a fixed menu? Do you cater for vegetarian and vegan options. My wife does not eat fish meat or eggs

We had the 'Error' set menu and it was amazing. I have several food allergies and the staff were very diligent, so all I had to do was enjoy the food. Every course we had was delicious, but special mention to the turnip tops with caviar, lamb and potatoes, lobster, duck and the autumnal citrus fruits. We requested wine pairings and the choices were excellent. The service is wonderful, all are friendly and knowledgable and prepared to spend time discussing the food and wine with you. To dine here is not just about the food (with is excellent) but also about the service and hospitality, which makes it an occasion.

I have been in this paradise, one of the most beautiful places in Rome, impeccable service and local, great dinner, many courses but tiny, I would have preferred a few less courses but portions a little 'more abundant to better savor them.

Best restaurant we went to in Rome! And with an amazing view. The restaurant is at the top of the Hassler hotel. The tasting menu was impeccable, as well as service! There were several amazing dishes! We recommend it to everyone who goes there!

I'll be synthetic. Best dinner of the year, On over 120 tables of the year 2025, the best dinner. A confirmation. Andrea Antonini Undisputed king of the capital's cuisine (with hand and internal grip). The hall, the best in Rome. Michelin continues its utopian assessment. Here you should reverse the stars with the other one emblazoned, very very disappointing. Here, at Imago, the kitchen goes to a thousand.

A crescendo of flavors and emotions in a truly suggestive location, capable of conquering from the first glance.  The chefs kitchen is the true beating heart of the experience: carefully studied dishes, selected ingredients and original combinations that enhance the taste without ever being excessive. Each course is a surprise, a discovery of balance and creativity that satisfies the senses.  Service completes the picture impeccably: professional, friendly and attentive staff, always present but never intrusive. The rhythm of the dinner is perfect, leaving room for conversation and full enjoyment of every moment.

After mediocre dinners at Moma and Il convivio, Imago is a winner  At the only privately owned 5 star hotel Hassler, Imago is both traditional and modern at the same time. Even the menu is split as such - classic and creative  We had the former and most dishes are very good to excellent. The best - sea urchin spaghetti, pine forest dessert, fast pace. Not the best - lamb tartare, sea bass, beef main (too fatty). The portions are tiny, but we were full after the meal. The ice cream cart at the end was a nice surprise   9/10

GOOD EVENING AND, I THINK, THAT THERE ARE NO WORDS TO JUDGE THE DELIGHT, THE PLEASURE OF EATING, THE QUALITY OF THE FOOD INDICATED ON THE MENU, THE FLAVORS THAT LITERALLY APPROPRIATE OUR MOUTH GIVING YOU THE PLEASURE OF TASTING IN ADDITION TO THE NEWS. I'M NOT EXAGGERATING, BUT I JUST TELL THE TRUTH. WE DO NOT FORGET THE FRIENDLY, POLITE AND VERY KIND STAFF IN GETTING COMFORTABLE. IT'S THE PURE AND SIMPLE TRUTH.

This is a most marvelous restaurant offering a wonderful view over the city but it's not the view that excels it's the food. We had the Creative Lab tasting menu which throughout all the courses provided delightful and exceptional taste sensations, with flavours and textures full of surprises and joy, all perfectly cooked and presented. A truly wonderful gourmet experience. I should also mention the staff were excellent, attentive and discreet, a rarity amongst many restaurants where the staff are constantly filling your wine glasses etc. Here the staff too seem to be enjoying the occasion. The sommelier was very knowledgeable with advice as to which wine to choose and introduced me to a sparkling Italian wine, Giulio Ferrari Riserva del Fondatore, which for my money can compete with some of the best champagne houses. All in all it was a most memorable experience which will stay with me for a long time to come. I cannot recommend Imago more highly.
Excellent. Place that would undoubtedly deserve two stars! Friendly and knowledgeable staff Great tasting menu ERROR

I often don't bother to write reviews but looking at the last two poor reviews, I felt impelled to do so. The view is exquisite and they could be lazy about the food but the food rivals the exceptional food. It has a Roman heart but is highly inventive cooking, with a touch of humour in execution and presentation. Truly wonderly flavours, beautifully presented. The service was excellent and the waiters - unusally - seemed to genuinely enjoy serving and love food. A totally joyful gastronomic evening. We ate at another Michelin restaurant in Rome the following evening, that was quite disappointing. Reccommended with no reservations.
Disappointing execution for a starred restaurant  lacks the soul of Michelin quality

As someone who regularly dines at Michelin-starred establishments, I approached Imgo with balanced expectations: not just for the cuisine, but for the full experience that a Michelin star should guarantee  excellence in hospitality, atmosphere, and emotional resonance through food.  The result was sadly underwhelming.  While the food presentation met technical standards, the flavors lacked depth and originality. Courses were well-executed but uninspired, and left little emotional imprint  a key element in any truly memorable dining experience.  More concerning was the service. Despite booking well in advance, we were not informed that panoramic-view seats required special request. Upon arrival, we asked politely to switch and were met with a rigid and indifferent refusal. No attempt was made to accommodate or empathize. This kind of cold service undermines what Michelin cuisine is supposed to represent  not just precision, but warmth, care, and thoughtfulness.  In essence, Imgo offers a beautiful setting, but relies too heavily on its view and reputation. The soul  the human touch, the storytelling, the hospitality  is missing.  I say this with no hostility, only with genuine disappointment. Imgo feels like a restaurant that once earned a star, but has since settled into complacency. A Michelin star is not just a badge  its a promise, and that promise was not kept.

We had high expectations when booking Imgo, a Michelin-starred restaurant in Rome. Sadly, our experience was far from what you would expect at this level.  Despite booking well in advance, we were never informed that the "vista panoramica" seats required a special request. When we politely asked to change to those seats upon arrival, the staff refused with a surprisingly cold and dismissive attitudeno flexibility, no courtesy, no explanation.  For a restaurant of this prestige and price range, service should be impeccable. Instead, we felt like we were being processed, not welcomed. The food was decent, but not enough to make up for the poor hospitality.  Overall, very disappointing. We wont be returning, and we wouldnt recommend it to others either.

We had a lovely experience and enjoyed the beautiful views. We very much enjoyed the creative tasting menu and small portions. We have been to other Michelin restaurants and tried other tasting menus and agree that the size and amount of courses were excellent at Imago. The staff was attentive and courteous. We would come here again and recommend to couples that enjoy a tasting menu and lovely city views. It is a great spot at the top of the Spanish Steps.

The location and food were good, but nothing stood out as exceptional for a one-star Michelin restaurant. Unfortunately, the service left much to be desired, they came across as arrogant and inattentive. The staff made the dining experience feel rushed and uncomfortable, as if we were constantly being watched. Shockingly, my plate was cleared before I had even finished eating, which is completely unacceptable at this level of dining. While the view was beautiful and the food enjoyable, this was one of the most disappointing experiences Ive had at a Michelin-rated establishment.

Imgo is a true gem in the culinary scene of Rome. The food is exquisite, the service is impeccable, and the views of the city are breathtaking. The menu is a perfect blend of traditional Italian flavors with a modern twist. A must-visit for anyone looking for a memorable dining experience in Rome.

Centro neighborhood in Rome, with its historical allure, beckons to the culturally curious. The neighborhood is home to the iconic Pantheon, a testament to Rome's ancient grandeur, and the picturesque Piazza Navona, a lively square filled with Baroque masterpieces. The narrow cobblestone streets are lined with an array of trattorias offering traditional Roman dishes, charming gelaterias, and artisan boutiques. With easy access to multiple bus lines and the Metro, Centro makes traversing the Eternal City a breeze. A stay in Centro offers an authentic immersion into Rome's rich tapestry of history, art, and gastronomy.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
Order the Brigette Bardot mocktail, the rosemary focaccia bread, and the salmone cioccolate!
Bonjour, le restaurant propose til un menu pour le dner du nouvel an?

For our family, the best food combined with the best service from Trastevere and Rome.  We recommend Amatriciana, Carbonara and the suppli.  A pleasant, cozy and relaxed environment. Disguised, friendly and impeccable attention from Dario (funny guy) and Laura as well.
Not to be dramatic, but the focaccia changed my life. Best spritz aperol Ive had in a while as well. Highly recommend. The live music was so pleasant and added to such a nice atmosphere. :)
very good drinks, food and friendly service. I recommend visiting this place. Dario is a great waiter. I recommend it 100%
Great experience ! Dario was such a great host. Drinks are delicious. I recommend this spot for a meeting with friends :)
Pleasant and helpful staff, a pleasant aperitif, in a well-appointed room. Once a small bar, just below the school, it is now a small attraction of excellent quality. What more could you ask for?
Verry good service, top quality Food , we came multiple times back, for sure 10 out of 10!! For me the best restaurant Where I have eaten in Rome !
Precious local a gem set a stone's throw from Piazza navona we had a great time and ate very well! Friendly and courteous staff recommend it to everyone

Place with an intimate and elegant atmosphere, exquisite food and above all really warm staff: a huge thank you to Ginevra, a very sweet person, pampered us right away, super attentive to the needs of the customer, thanks to her me and my partner spent an unforgettable evening. We will definitely return

A beautiful discovery in the center (and it is not obvious). You eat well and go out in a good mood  especially Wael and his colleague are great, we joked all night and they made us feel at home. Great, we will definitely see you again!
Wael served us pretty well, the food very good and the neighborhood quiet. I highly recommend this place!
The food is quite good, the neighborhood touched us very quiet and the view towards the square is very nice. The dishes come well served.

We had the artichokes, carbonara, tiramisu & the cheesecake. All of the menu items we had were divine & our server, Wael, was very charismatic. He was fantastic, checking on us regularly & providing wonderful recommendations. I could not recommend this restaurant enough!
Everything was very nice! friendly staff and incredible pasta!!! the place is awesome with a very romantic environment. I would recommend it to go with anyone!!

Being in a highly touristic area I expected to eat discreetly if not badly, but I was highly surprised. We went in three as a family and nothing to say, you eat really well. The staff is courteous, the timing is right and the location needless to say .. I highly recommend it
Italian food at its best! The pasta, the pizza, the wine, the place.. Everything was exquisite, thank you for everything
Everything was Amazing! The food, the place, the waiters, Amin was very kind and attentive to us, definetly would visit again!
The pasta was perfection and the service amazing. The ambience was cozy and warm. We loved it.
Very nice Carbonara. Amin is very handsome. The area was very nice too if you want to have a nice lunch after long walks...
I ate Carpaccio and Carbona spaghetti. The staff were also friendly and delightful to enjoy the trip to Rome.
Went here with my team  best meal I had while in town and the service was incredible!!! Near all the monuments and convenient!

Great experience in every respect. Friendly atmosphere, attentive and friendly service, great quality dishes prepared with fresh and well presented ingredients. Excellent value for money. Absolutely recommended!

Absolutely delicious! We had a very yummy, fun and chilled lunch at this gorgeous spot next to Piazza Navona. The meatballs appetiser was amazing and the pasta was sensational. The service was excellent and the staff top notch. Ali looked after us and was a great waiter, very friendly and helpful.

Young and well-to-do families are the street flavor of Parioli. A new kind of Rome, this area is centuries away from the Renaissance with its pockets of 1930s palaces, tony boutiques, open-air markets and plenty of coffee shops. Parioli was built as an enclave for last centurys haute bourgeois and still represents as such in 21st century Rome. Need a break? The area has several great sporting clubs known for tennis and riding, a wonderful modern art museum, easy access to the zoo (Europes oldest), and is nestled around Romes very best parks including Villa Borghese, Villa Ada and Villa Glori.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
Do not sit inside because you will feel like you are in a sarcophagus. And its in a dark kind of cramped alley with no view.

I had been to this place maybe 10 years ago and tonight I went back. It retains the excellent characteristics of that time. Great food, qualified staff, prepared and welcoming, as well as polite and kind. Of course I will return. I highly recommend it!

On our last visit in Rome we arrived to this hidden gem to have romantic dinner and again the experience exceeded our expectations. Located in the heart of Rome, but quiet and intimate. Inside and outside tables. Perfect personal servise, Englishspeaking staff. So tasty food, good choice for vegetarian. Good wine and coctails list. So happy it still has its class. Very recommended. Enjoy!
Food was okay. Ambience was not great - was raining so no outside tables and the room inside was very cramped and there were gnats flying around all over. The waitress was nice.
Discreet, quiet, nice suipo and excellent food! Lasagne, risotto, sea barbecue, excellent chop
Excellent moment!!! We are looking for something simple and real, away from the tumult of tourism! With pleasure to Italy and not to break our purse!

After reading several very positive reviews about this restaurant, we went there as a family. What a disappointment... Nothing Italian on the plate: bland cuisine, without taste or flavor. We really had the impression that this restaurant is only for foreign tourists, which was the case that night. It is not worth a visit or a reservation. The only good thing was the service, which was still pleasant. Go your way.

Walking through the alleys of the center we found ourselves in front of this restaurant with outdoor tables, very cute and inviting We sat down and ordered All great, well cooked and fresh raw material We ate fish and as I repeat everything fresh Fabulous raw sea bass Congratulations

Local a few steps from Piazza Navona. Small environment with very close tables. Corrected the service. Too oily the Roman artichokes, excellent cut of picanha as well as baked potatoes side dish: good larded pork fillet. Fair tiramisu, good panna cotta; just the bill (about 50  person). 4shltelle plentiful.
The pasta is unbelievable - order as much as you can and you can eat! Service is nice and it is off the crowd! We will be back!
A very nice Welcoming followed by delicious cuisine. The very positive opinions of the people who came before us are confirmed.
We chose this place, for the many positive reviews. We had a great time. Very good food, nice person. Council

A wonderful place! Wonderful people, very tasty food, cozy location and great location. Employees are responsive, you may ask not to add some of the ingredients. Excellent pasta carbonara and 4 cheeses.
Delicious food, comfortable, sober and faithful to the basics atmosphere. Very friendly and skilled staff.. It was a very satisfying experience. Recommended.
Second time visiting,will not be the last. Love this small restaurant - great food,nice staff! You will not regret a visit here!
Nice and small restaurant away from tourists crowds. Both services and foods were great. Value was reasonable. We were able to enjoy meals finally away from loud and crowded tourists places.

Wonderful restaurant, sensational service and the food of the Gods... I recommend a thousand times! Do not fail to try the fillet with truffles... it is so delicious, I have not eaten anywhere like it!

Centro neighborhood in Rome, with its historical allure, beckons to the culturally curious. The neighborhood is home to the iconic Pantheon, a testament to Rome's ancient grandeur, and the picturesque Piazza Navona, a lively square filled with Baroque masterpieces. The narrow cobblestone streets are lined with an array of trattorias offering traditional Roman dishes, charming gelaterias, and artisan boutiques. With easy access to multiple bus lines and the Metro, Centro makes traversing the Eternal City a breeze. A stay in Centro offers an authentic immersion into Rome's rich tapestry of history, art, and gastronomy.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
Io e mia moglie non mangiamo carne. Riuscite comunque a non lasciarci a digiuno?
Ciao per Pasqua, se ci sono ancora posti disponibili (4 persone), fate un menu particolare???
We were very satisfied with the dinner tasted at the Osteria del Cavaliere. Environment, service, food, price, everything at the top.
Very good restaurant close to Piazza Re di Roma. Perfect service and very friendly staff.Very good value for money.

We stayed at Incanto Chic, a B&B in the center of Sacrofano. The owners are the same as the restaurant Il Cavaliere and we had a great time both in the structure and in the restaurant. We appreciated the attention to customers, the welcome, the quality of food and the live music that accompanied us throughout the evening. We took the tasting menu where we could taste the typical specialties of the place and it was all very good. The great price, 35  per person! The location is central in the village and the place is in typical medieval style very nice and 'Inside there is also a very nice cave to see. If we happen again in Sacrofano we will definitely return! Highly recommended!

I was at the Osteria del Cavaliere on a Wednesday evening in November. The room is small but for this very familiar and warm, as well as all the staff members! We started with the appetizers, all delicious (the fried polentines with amazing cream cheese and pepper), except for the tartare but only because the truffle sauce almost completely covered the flavor of the meat. The first all fantastic, my favorite pumpkin cream goodies. The main courses of meat are their must: the fantastic shin, but the rib of suckling pig already melted only when cut! I will gladly come back whenever I find myself in the vicinity!

I had the pleasure of dining in this restaurant for two nights during my holiday in Rome and I was thrilled.  The food is authentic and genuine, just like what Grandma cooked: simple flavors, but rich in tradition and care.  The atmosphere is warm and intimate, perfect for feeling at home from the first moment.  Price quality ratio is great, hard to find better.  A beautiful discovery that I highly recommend and will gladly return to.

Food was excellent and well priced. Service was really good. Servers recommendation were spot on and honestly might be the best food we had so far on this trip! A must visit. We didn't have a reservation but they still accommodated us. Overall, lovely little place.
Very welcoming and wonderful staff and nice eat delicious and great value for money.... highly recommended

You need to go to this restaurant! The food was absolutely amazing and the staff and ambiance only add to this amazing experience. My husband and I ordered the pork ribs and the pesto gnocchi and we couldnt get enough of each bite. Make sure to make a reservation in advance as tables fill up quickly. Definitely one of the best meals weve ever had.
This was simply one of the best meals my wife and I ever had, you simply have to go and see for yourself! We had the pork ribs, gnocchi, and tiramisu. Go see for yourself if you dont believe us.
This is the best meal we had of the whole trip! Off the beaten path but SO worth it! Our family is of Italian descent and thought that one of best meal ever!

I had dinner yesterday at this restaurant with my father and a friend. Cosy and welcoming environment, tavern furniture that I love. Girls who serve very nice and efficient. Special dishes, well cooked, well served and tasty. I'll be back soon.

It is not easy to tame ingredients with a strong flavor, in this restaurant, they know how to do it. Matriciana a bomb, tasty meatballs with sauce demanding shoe..... honest prices, and it is not a detail. Highly recommended.

This table delighted us for this first dinner of our stay in Rome. Impeccable service with great cordiality. Very pleasant menu, with uncomplicated inventiveness. Cozy atmosphere and a beautiful clientele.
Good food, it's small so it fills up quickly, I'd make a reservation. The service was nice with handwritten bill. Food was very, very good.
Very nice restaurant , the two girls in the room splendid, delicious food with dishes from Abruzzo, we were very good. Super recommended

San Giovanni, Rome's oldest neighborhood, is steeped in history and teems with culture and authenticity. This district, a hub for timeless Roman architecture, is home to the Basilica di San Giovanni in Laterano, a magnificent cathedral that draws the admiration of locals and tourists alike. The area's culinary scene offers an array of trattorias serving traditional Roman cuisine, along with a variety of street food options. Well-connected by the metro and bus systems, San Giovanni is a convenient base for travelers looking to explore the Eternal City. A stroll down the Via Appia Antica, a historic Roman road, offers an enchanting journey into the city's past.

This is the version of our website addressed to speakers of English in the United States. If you are a resident of another country or region, please select the appropriate version of Tripadvisor for your country or region in the drop-down menu.
On the side of Via Appia is this unforgettable gem. It offers a varied menu that includes dishes typical of ancient Rome. The atmosphere and service are excellent. Highly recommended
The best thing is the cozy and well heated place that makes you relax and enjoy the atmosphere. Good polenta with sprouts and sausages and cherry pie. Excellent Shirah from Marconi winery.

Together with colleagues (a group of 28 people) we decided to spend a day in Rome. We stayed at the Vatican and then had lunch at the Hostaria Antica Roma. We were welcomed in the beautiful fireplace room, a warm and comfortable environment, in line with the whole room... The place thrilled everyone! But even more we appreciated the friendliness, helpfulness and sympathy of Paul, who, an expert and scholar of ancient Roman cuisine, brightened the lunch with anecdotes and stories about the place and the menu that offers. The lunch really great. Delicious porchetta and pecorino cheese (the latter exclusive recipe of the restaurant), excellent first courses (which were supposed to be tastings, but which were actually served in abundance) and delicious sausage and arrosticini. Perfect value for money. I will also return with friends and family. I highly recommend it.

I had heard about it and we decided to try the re-enactment of the cuisine of ancient Rome. It was a very pleasant experience both for the dishes tasted that take you back in time but also for the hospitality of Chef Paolo who tirelessly illustrated the processes for the reconstruction of this cuisine so ancient and the history of his family and this truly welcoming and magical place. Also a reading environment with a library with historical texts and art from the classical world.
Abbiamo trascorso l'inizio del Nuovo Anno in una location incantevole, accolti dal calore del camino e coccolati da uno staff che ci ha fatto gustare i sapori di una cucina prelibata. Super
Restaurant with family atmosphere, very tasty food. Located on the old Via Appia (charming walk). Paolo and his family are very nice hosts.
We ate excellently in nice stylish place. It does not hurt the great sympathy of the owner. The dishes of ancient Rome are also original and very well cooked.
Un grazie sincero dalla nostra famiglia: siete sempre i benvenuti allHostaria, come a casa.
Beauty, hospitality and traditional cuisine: the perfect mix for a wonderful celebration

I chose the Hostaria to celebrate an important birthday of a member of our family. We wanted to live a unique experience, which would remain as an indelible memory... and so it was. The dazzling beauty of the view of Cecilia Metella's tomb in the welcome drink, the welcome of the rooms, the warmth of the room with the fireplace, the friendliness of the owners, the great food... we were pleased in everything and everything was perfect. Thank you! Francesca

Even if you have no intention of walking along Appian Way, this restaurant is a reason to do it. This was my second visit this year and will certainly return. The food is delicious and the cozy setting could not be more inviting. A good number of the dishes are made according to exact recipes of Ancient Rome and they knew how to eat well back then as well. This is a family run restaurant and the owner/chef takes the time needed to explain the dishes in an entertaining fashion.

Put the Sunday before Christmas, warm as if it were almost spring, a tasting of dishes inspired by ancient Rome, the real one, plus the sympathy, experience and historical-archaeological but also comic tales of Paul who is truly one of a kind! If you want to eat superbly and get passionate, this is the place for you, the word of a new loyal customer!

Fantastic restaurant, went there at night and it was all lit up like a fairyland playground. Was personally greeted by the owner who chatted with me and helped me order. Delicious food was followed by an enticing dessert, The restaurant was surrounded by park like grounds containing beautiful statuary . While there, as I was coming up the long, winding path, I felt the presence of someone right behind me, then they came up on my right side and as they were passing me, I glanced to my right and nobody was there! Right before that a black cat ran hissing, spitting and growling along my left side and passed me with a small roar of a major hiss. It was running as fast as it could and passed me right before my otherworldly visitor came up on my right. I think I felt the presence of a ghost that dark night at the Osteria! What a strange experience...

Dear Mary Ellen, thank you very much for your wonderful and vividly written review. It truly made us smile.  The Via Appia Antica has been welcoming travelers, soldiers, poets, pilgrimsand the occasional mysterious presencefor more than 2,000 years. So yes, it is quite possible that you were greeted by one of our very benevolent resident ghosts, who still enjoy strolling the paths at night and making sure guests feel properly welcomed.  As for the black cat, we can confirm he is very much alive, officially in charge of night patrols, and occasionally a little dramaticespecially when surprised by unseen colleagues from the past.  We are delighted that you enjoyed the atmosphere, the food, the dessert, and the conversation. The magic you felt is part of what makes this place special: history, nature, good food, and a touch of mysteryall living peacefully together.  We hope to welcome you again soon. Who knows perhaps next time the ghosts will join you at the tablequietly and politely, of course.  Warm regards,  Paolo Magnanimi

In a beautiful villa facing the mausoleum of Cecilia Metella is located this distinguished restaurant. Excellent cuisine and convivial environment, the owner provides nice anecdotes of ancient Roman recipes and guests of the local.
La ringraziamo di cuore per le sue parole: siamo felici che la sua esperienza sia stata piacevole.

A long anticipated Anniversary Dinner disappointment. The location is quite special, the interior quite charming. My husband arranged for a little flower arrangement for our table next to an impressive fireplace adorned with everything autumn. There was a large table of dinners, apparently a gourmet group next to us. The host showered his attention on this group and when it came to us we were pretty much ignored. Dinner was fine, nothing remarkable. I ordered dessert and it was awful. overly sweet and I couldn't eat it. No offer for something else, or an offer for coffee. The dessert was deducted from our bill but just being ignored ruined our Anniversary Celebration for me.

Dear Madam, thank you sincerely for sharing your experience, and I am truly sorry that your anniversary dinner did not meet your expectations. Such an important occasion deserves care and attention, and it saddens me to know that it did not feel that way for you.  Allow me, with the utmost respect, to offer some clarification.  The dessert you tasted is the Cassata of Oplontis, a recipe that is more than 2,000 years old, reconstructed from archaeological and historical sources. It is an ancient Roman dessert, intentionally rich in honey, and I completely understand that its original flavor may not suit all modern palates. For this reason, as soon as I learned that you did not enjoy it, I removed it from your bill and asked whether you would prefer something else, hoping to make up for the inconvenience.  Regarding the attention in the dining room, I always try to be present for all guests without being intrusiveespecially on a private and intimate occasion such as a wedding anniversary. To make your evening more special, I had prepared our most romantic table by the fireplace, along with the flower arrangement your husband requested.  I am truly sorry that, despite these gestures, you felt overlooked in any way. It was never my intention, and it pains me that this impression affected your celebration.  I would be pleased to welcome you again and offer you an experience that reflects the care, hospitality, and warmth we strive to provide every day. It is my dutyand my genuine wishto make things right.  With respect and sincere regret, Paolo Magnanimi

To celebrate the confirmation of our son with family members we chose this restaurant that we already knew. The place is obviously very nice is characteristic for the location next to the Cecilia Metella Mausoleum.  The atmosphere is very warm and welcoming. We ate in the Goethe Room in front of the burning fireplace.  Paolo is very helpful and friendly, and at the same time very professional, the dad Massimo very kind.  All our guests were very satisfied with both the menu and the place.  We couldn't have made a better choice.
Very welcoming and particular place. Roman cuisine menu with dishes also different from the usual. The owner is a real star.
na gioia leggere che ve siete trovati bene. LHostaria ve aspetta a braccia aperte.

Our experience at Mammas Bistro was 5* throughout thanks to Nikola who kept the place open just in time for us. We were even able to order ahead through WhatsApp and enjoyed the delicious tuna steak and home made ravioli. The service and wine recommendation were exceptional and we even received a birthday surprise gift! Really cant rate this place more highly enough.

Thank you for such a wonderful review and for choosing Mamas Bistro for such a special occasion. Were delighted to hear that your entire experience was a 5-star one, and that Nikola was able to welcome you and take care of everything  from ordering ahead via WhatsApp to the final birthday surprise.  Were so glad you enjoyed the tuna steak, homemade ravioli, and our wine recommendation. Moments like these are exactly why we do what we do.  Your kind words truly mean a lot to our team, and we hope to welcome you back again on your next visit to Belgrade.  Warm regards, Mamas Bistro Team
Perfect food, perfect service and great wine Belgrade has great restaurant in city center
Delicious food, great wine and very friendly service! Nice and quiet ambiance and very cosy. The service was great from when we were greeted and all throughout

This restaurant was just across the street from our hotel which is why we chose it, but oh my goodness, it was wonderful! Husbands steak was perfection and my soup was tasty with lots of fresh bread and a delicious salad. Great atmosphere and excellent service from Nikolai. Highly recommended!

Absolutely fantastic steak! Perfectly fried to the point, super tender and full of flavor. The service was very friendly and attentive, the atmosphere cozy. Mamas Bistro is definitely worth a visit  well be back!

Thank you so much for your fantastic review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed our steak  cooked to perfection, tender, and full of flavour is exactly what we strive for. Thank you as well for your kind words about our friendly service and cozy atmosphere. Mamas Bistro is always happy to welcome returning guests  we look forward to seeing you again!
Excellent food with great service in a very nice ambience. Nice menu, good wine and an extremely nice and striving waiter

Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed the food, the service, the atmosphere, and our wine selection. It truly means a lot to us that our waiter made you feel especially welcome. We would be happy to welcome you again anytime in Belgrade!

Excellent, cozy place to have a great food experience! Wide variety of beverages, food produce excellent and of quality, big thank you to the brothers who owns Mama's Bistro as their hospitality made us feel very welcomed. Don't miss out of this gem in Belgrade, worth the visit for sure.

Thank you so much for such a wonderful review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed the food, the wide beverage selection, and the cozy atmosphere of our restaurant. It truly means a lot to us that you felt welcomed by the family spirit  Mamas Bistro is run with love, care, and attention to every guest. Thank you for calling us a hidden gem in Belgrade, and we hope to welcome you again on your next visit!
Food was absolutely amazing, I had one of the best beefsteaks I've ever had in my life. Service was 10/10 very kind staff. This is most definitely one of the best restaurants in Belgrade.

Thank you so much for such an amazing review!  Were thrilled that our beefsteak left such a strong impression  we carefully select our meat and prepare it with great respect for the ingredient. Thank you as well for the kind words about our service and team; warm and attentive hospitality is at the heart of Mamas Bistro. Being considered one of the best restaurants in Belgrade is truly an honor. We look forward to welcoming you again!
Very tasty foods and very polite people  The place is clean and for non smokers and it makes a great atmosphere Just the price was a little bit higher than expected

Thank you very much for your kind words and honest feedback!  Were glad you enjoyed the food, the politeness of our team, and the clean, non-smoking atmosphere  these are things we truly care about. We understand your comment about the pricing and always strive to ensure that the quality of ingredients, preparation, and service justify the overall experience. We would be happy to welcome you again!
A hidden gem. Worth it! Top service, lots of atmosphere, cozy and the food super tasty and prepared with love!

Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed the atmosphere, the attentive service, and our food, prepared with love and care. It truly means a lot to us to be described as a hidden gem. We look forward to welcoming you again!
I came with my wife. Very romantic place. The wine is very good. The price is expensive, but its really worth it. Their dessert is really delicious :)

Thank you so much for your lovely review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed a romantic evening with your spouse and appreciated our wine selection and desserts. We truly believe that quality and care are always worth it, and it means a lot that you felt the same. We look forward to welcoming you again!

Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed the atmosphere, our unique dishes, and the service  these are the things we take great pride in at Mamas Bistro. Thank you also for mentioning reservations; were a small space and want every guest to feel comfortable and well taken care of. We look forward to welcoming you again!

Everything at Mama's Bistro, a family restaurant, is perfect. A beautiful setting, wonderful hospitality, and fantastic food. I was in Belgrade for three days last weekend. I ate at Mama's Bistro for two nights. No need for an adventure. This will be my favorite place on my future trips to Belgrade. Thanks Nicola and his Brother.... Mustafa, Trkiye

Thank you so much, Mustafa!  Your words truly touched us. It means the world to us that during your short stay in Belgrade, you chose to dine with us twice  that is the greatest compliment a family restaurant can receive.  Mamas Bistro is built on warmth, hospitality, and tradition, and were grateful you felt that. 4.5/5  The restaurant is small, not very comfortable to seat. But atmosphere is cute, food is amazing - service was also perfect. Would come back again for sure
Super food. The t-bone was a true winner. Great service, great service, great atmosphere. Easy access location. Thank you!

Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  Were delighted that you enjoyed our T-bone  its one of our signature dishes, made from the finest cuts and prepared with great care. On a recent business trip to Serbia, my colleague unearthed this fantastic hidden gem of a restauranttucked away in a spot that feels like a total secret. The entrance might throw you off at first glance, but push through the doors and treat yourself to some incredible Mediterranean-inspired cuisine! The starters and mains were all absolutely delicious, and with a few beers each to round things out, the total came to just 24 per head. If you're ever in Belgrade, don't skip this placeit's a must!
Good food, easy locar, nice service. The place with the Mediterranean menu is probably more intended for summer dining with friends, but it worked in the cold fall too.
Not delicious, not worth that money. The food is not delicious.. and there's nothing to write... I don't know how they gave the restaurant a star.. the portions are beautiful and that's it.
Really Good food and atmosphere  The concept of order is making it easy and interactive.  The food was delicious for respecting prices, service was really nice.  Recommend it 100%

The Mezestoran is an outstanding restaurant located centrally in Belgrade. We had a fabulous family meal at a very reasonable price. The staff were excellent. They were warm welcoming and very helpful. The food was West first class and the Greek wine delightful. Many thanks to all the staff for offering us such a lovely evening.

We dined twice in this restaurant during our stay. It is a warm and typical local place. The starters and dishes are excellent. The ingredients are quality and the cuisine offered original and tasty. The atmosphere is friendly and relaxed.  The value for money is quite reasonable. We recommend

We had an amazing dinner at Mezestoron in Belgrade. From the moment we walked in, we were warmly welcomed by the host and staff, who were all incredibly kind, professional, and attentive. Our waiter was exceptional and made sure everything was perfect throughout the evening. The food was absolutely delicious  every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented.  Thank you for a truly wonderful evening  well definitely be coming back!
Visited this cozy restaurant with nice and warm interior. Staff is very polite and friendly, helpful with dishes and the food is really tasty and homemade. Keep doing in that way.

The food is really nice and the atmosphere is beautiful.  On the negative side, we waited too long to have the meals served and they were not served at the same time. Additionally, the portion of the main dish, filled aubergine, was delicious but really too small for the main dish. Should be at least double the size.  House wine is nice, we can recommend it.  This is not the first time we came here, usually we enjoy nice atmosphere friendly and professional staff, and delicious food.
Lovely hidden spot. Great outdoor seating area. Perfext for summer nights. The food was good and the service was quick. If you are looking for a greek restaurant in Belgrade-check this out.

The people of the Mediterranean should fill the faces of the owners of the place and the kitchen team. The serving is terribly delayed, the dishes are undercooked, oversalted and over-dressed with vinegar. The team is slow.

This restaurant has a sophisticated causal atmosphere with the spirit of Greece.    The food was extraordinary; very tasty and delicious . The service was impeccable !   I highly recommend this establishment

I wish I could give this place 4.5 stars (their average rating) but I cant so I gave them 5 stars because the food was great. The service was lacking - staff were friendly but it took a long time e to get anyone to acknowledge us or bring us a menu or come to take our order so come for the food but expect the service might not be as good as one would expect from a really good restaurant.
Everything was perfect. The staff, the atmosphere, everything was so relaxed. And the was delicious, as always. Tnank you and bravo!

The croutons in the Cretan salad were very hard, and the cucumbers were not peeled, resulting in an unpleasant taste. The shrimp pasta was also underwhelming, as both the shrimp and the sauce lacked flavor. Additionally, the squid was rubbery, making the overall meal less enjoyable.

Two regular meals, nothing out of the menu were seved 15 minutes apart. That defeats the idea of dinning together. We were left wondering if the second order was even taken at all.

The food, atmosphere and appearance is good. Our food came in two parts. There was more than 10 minutes in between so one had cold food and the other half was still hot! Strange that you can't serve 2 dishes at the same time! Didn't find the portion s that big either. Im not a big eater and my plate was empty!)
Great place for a delicious dinner. We ordered the set set and couldn't finish it. I didn't expect there to be so many dishes :) Nice waiters and relaxing atmosphere.
This restaurant is exellent, perfect for couples, food is autentic mexican. Great expirience. Stuff are hospotable, food is fresh and restaurant is very clean. Nice ambient.

This Mexican restaurant is a true gem, especially when it comes to their margaritas. The vibrant and authentic flavors transport you to a fiesta with every sip. The extensive margarita menu offers something for every taste preference. The ambiance complements the experience perfectly, creating a lively and enjoyable atmosphere. A definite recommendation for margarita enthusiasts seeking an authentic and flavorful dining experience.

We decided to celebrate the New Year in this restaurant. From the first minute the impressions began to deteriorate! I had to wait outside for more than 30 minutes to get in, considering that all the tables were paid for, since outerwear was accepted for a fee. For more than an hour, there was nothing on the table except alcohol and water, not even a chair for the children to sit separately. The menu has changed dramatically, which was agreed in advance and did not correspond to reality. We constantly asked and waited for appetizers/main courses, everyone ended up hungry. It felt like we ended up getting cold leftovers from the kitchen. The impression was that the attitude towards foreigners was disdainful, and the local population was indifferent to the quality of service and food. We paid 92 per person and, in my opinion, I have never seen worse service.

Paid 460 for new years (5 people/ 6 tickets and here is what we got:   Menu completely changed last minute without any notice   We never got what we ordered and we got what we didnt order. Also waited for that food for a really long time   We had to keep asking so many times for food, drinks, chair etc    We never got sea bass and mushrooms that was pre-ordered from fast menu. Also never got dessert, which was included, but our waitress said that we need to pay extra for that   We got three main dishes to share for 5 of us and it was cold, it felt like we just got the leftovers from kitchen or whatever they had available.   Huge line outside the door
Amazing place with awesome atmosphere. Very well recommended. Food, drinks and staff are perfect. Authentic Mexican place in the city
Wont serve you if youre a foreigner (maybe just specifically americans) see picture for example of food/drink to expect

Amazing atmosphere and very nice cocktails. Our host Jowan was very polite and recommended us the best cocktails. I personally liked the Solarita a lot. The love music made our evening complete, thanks! 10/10 would recommend.

Based on the great reviews, my daughter and I walked from the city center to this restaurant (about 45 minutes). The food was pretty good - although huge portions! I was surprised the fajitas didnt include the flour wraps, but they can be ordered separately. Service was good and it has a very nice atmosphere.   What really detracted from the experience was trying to enjoy a dinner with my 11 year old daughter and being completely surrounded by smokers who lit up one cigarette after another. Yes, its allowed in Belgrade but Ill never understand why restaurants in 2023 - in ANY country- dont have a non-smoking section so non-smokers and children arent forced to inhale second hand smoke when eating. Yuck. We left having barely finished our meals.  This is likely a bigger issue than this restaurant, but I will gladly take my business somewhere that can offer a more pleasant atmosphere for everyone- not just smokers.. there are a few options in Belgrade!
Amazing food, been here 5 times and cannot be happier. One of Belgrades best restaurants. Everyone loved the food and the service. Deserves a michelin star!

We had a family lunch , and it was perfect. They were very polite and because we had a lot of the kids who dont like spicy food they created Mexican dishes suitable for them. We had a lot of different meals and everything was really tasty especially the prawns.  We will surely add this place on the list for our lunch/dinners.
Great food, terrible, incompetent service. Waiters were painfully slow, they served starters together with half of the main, without bringing cutlery.

Thank you so much for your wonderful words! Were thrilled that you enjoyed  feedback like yours truly inspires us.  We cant wait to welcome you back and share more flavors with you!

A breathtaking taste trip. 7 unforgettable flavors matched by 7 indigenous Syrbistan wines; the harmonious wine and dishes are so high, and the plates are truly creative. High-aromatic sweet-wine breeze served with sweet match. The most delicious pairing is the sharp pairing of our cherry with high body cherry. The presentation is in English and we were very pleased with the service.

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We strive to offer a unique and exceptional dining experience, and your feedback assures us were on the right track. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Thanks again for your kind words.

We thought of it as an average restaurant until we entered and started serving, but our mindsets completely changed as the chefs top segment signature plates came in. We wanted to photograph every detail on the plates. It was a true art. The menu was created based on the number of products. The plates in line were delightful. The wines to accompany every plate were hand-selected. Point shot matches. Thank you so much for giving us this experience. The lady who served us was very experienced and courteous. Pricing policy matched service. I think such an experience will be paid for. I hope it stays that quality.
Thank you so much for your kind words. Were thrilled to hear that your experience exceeded expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back. Thanks again for sharing your thoughts!
For a good dinner Just listen to the waiters and enjoy the displays the flavors and treats are incredible

Enso deserves its Michelin recommendation, but our experience was very mixed.   The restaurant itself is fairly small with a modern, trendy interior. We decided to order from the a la carte menu so we could try as many items as possible between the two of us and not be limited by the tasting menu.   I will start by saying the food is absolutely fantastic. Between the two of us, we ordered a large portion of the menu and every course seemed to be better than the last, and all of them were excellent. The food quality, inventiveness and presentation are deserving of at least one Michelin star in our opinion. I would fly back to Belgrade just to eat here.   Enso has one major issue they need to solve. Serbia still allows smoking in restaurants and we had smokers next to us and behind us. The tables are very close together so you will be affected by the smoke from other diners. The restaurant was full of smoke and the staff attempted to open the door to allow in some fresh air; only to be scolded by some diners who complained about the draft.  They then turned up the air conditioning to try and remove some of the smoke, but it remained an issue. Enso needs to at least try to seat all the smokers together. Im sure the food would have tested even better if it didnt have the extra Marlboro Spice .   The other issue we had was with the service. Our server (Jelena) was pleasant enough, but not as polished as one would expect from a restaurant at this level. She only brought one of our main entrees and never brought the other. When we were finally able to get her attention, she wanted to argue with us stating we had only ordered one main and that if we wanted a second, it would only  be an additional twenty-five minute wait. We received no apology and no attempt to correct the situation. At this point, it was late, we reeked of smoke and just wanted to remember the amazing food and not the poor service.   Overall, the chef at Enso should be celebrated. The food is fantastic. Hopefully they can work on the ambience and service issues.
Fantastic location and delicious food. Flawless operation. Nice interior. Expert explanation of the dishes A winner!

This was the third time we went to legat . We are from the Netherlands but every time we are in Serbia we just have to go to legat . Its our favorite restaurant in this part or Europe. Great food great service really friendly staff.

We attended a wedding in Serbia and the restaurant was used both for the ceremony and the dinner.  The food was spectacular, and the ambiance exquisite.  We highly recommend the place as the service was superb and the chef created amazing combinations
Great food, excellent service. Nice atmosphere. The best staff in town. My favourites - fish, octopus salad, foie gras
beautiful food and service, very pleasant space, you can feel at home because the service is very pleasant

We booked for dinner. Service and dishes of excellent quality and above all very generous portions. We paid 90 in total with two starters, a first course, a second course and two glasses of wine plus water

We found this restaurant on the Michelin list, and wanted to try it during our visit to Belgrade. We wanted to try a 7 cours experience for 5.500 dinars per pers. When we came and checked the menu, there was a complitely another menu for 8.500 dinars per pers. We were surprised and showed the waitress the home page menu. She said that it was the old one, and that we could talk with the restaurant Manager. He came with a shocking explanation that they havent the access to their home page, that tje reason was some external and internal factors (???), and that they cant do anything about it. He also said that they want us to be sutissfied, and that they will make some menu for the home page menu. I told him that we came for the experiance, which was already ruined by this surprise. He told me that I did not listened to him (??) about not having the access to their home page. I told him that it was a terrible excuse for the restaurant which is on Michellin list. We left the restaurant emediatelly. We hope that Michelin inspectors will remove this restaurant from their list, because it does not belong there.

It was a nice venue although lacking in atmosphere because it was largely empty. The tasting menu whilst nothing wrong with it was unimaginative and lacking in wow factor. The staff were pleasant and efficient. The wine pairing was good and well constructed.  The bill was good value for a Michelin star restaurant but then I was slightly surprised it had one.

Im fortunate to have eaten in a number of five star and Michelin restaurants around the world and whilst there was nothing wrong with our meal last night, there was nothing special about it either. The fact that the main course was roast chicken speaks volumes about the imagination and originality of the tasting menu. It was fine but nothing different or unusual.  The venue was lovely and the staff were very friendly but the fact that we only saw around 10 other diners during the whole time we were there suggests we are not alone in our view. For a Saturday night, that cannot be good news.

A great ambience, relaxing and friendly staff, and a great menu. We chose the tasting menu and were not disappointed. Whilst the dishes were both both regional and classical, Legat 1903 delivers. Well cooked food, nicely balanced and presented with an excellent wine pairing in a relaxed environment its definitely worth a visit. Highly recommended.

Interior is great and service is very professional. But! For the restaurant with the Michelin recommendation, food was not so good. It is on average level that you can meet in many 'ordinary' restaurants.

Overpriced for Serbia, rude parking attendant. Had eaten here before and food was good, but menu had changed, they discontinued everything on menu that was mid-range price. Everything is now extremely expensive. Due to this experience and the behavior of parking attendant we will not return. We were really surprised at his unprofessional and rude conduct.
What a restaurant . Its fine dining at its best with a rich menu , nice location chic romantic business restaurant . Top Food with Top service in a Top Place . A big Applause Legat 1903

All praise, one of the best restaurants in Belgrade. Luxurious interior, quiet music, excellent service, perfect food and an excellent selection of wines. I would gladly recommend the restaurant "Legat 1903" to my friends. Thank you again for your excellent service!

I dined at Legat 1903 on a trip to Belgrade. The decor is very nice indeed and they had a singing pianist which really made the evening. A fabulous tasting menu with excellent service to go with it. Highly recommended.
